categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air/Back Supporter,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air /Back Supporter
name: Spring Air Back Supporter Auburn Pillow Top
description: The Spring Air Back Supporter Auburn Pillow top is a BEST VALUE mattress including a luxurious pillow top that features the exclusive Back Supporter TM , with extra steel and power packed coils which increases lumbar support and durability in the center third of the mattress. Super Edge Plus TM offers added comfort and more surface area for better supported night's sleep. Head to toe helical wires help stabilize for less partner disturbance. Multiple high density and comfort polyurethane layers give long term comfort. We cover this with our Soft-Cool TM finish designer cover. A true value.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air/Platinum Back Supporter Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air /Platinum Back Supporter Hybrid
name: Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Supporter Meredith Box Top Plush
description: The Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Support Meredith Box Top Plush is an adjustable friendly hybrid mattress that combines the best Individual coil unit with Talalay Latex, wool and silk for breathable comfort and a generous layer of cooling memory foam. EnFinit® DESIGNER COVER Luxurious Phase Change Cover with EnFinit® Cooling Technology. The naturally healthy latex layer adds longevity, support, and coolness to the mattress. Cool gel technology is infused in the memory foam helping to reduce motion transfer and delivering reliable pressure relief where it's needed most. Our exclusive Back SupporterTM technology improves circulation and equalizes pressure distribution. SuperEdge Plus TM creates a stable sleeping area across the entire surface of the mattress. This is all topped with a wool and silk layer, giving that comfortable, cozy feel you love in a mattress. Get the great night's sleep you deserve with this multi-layered hybrid mattress.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air,Default Category/Mattresses/Spring Air/Platinum Back Supporter Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Spring Air /Platinum Back Supporter Hybrid
name: Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Supporter Rio Smooth Top
description: The Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Support Rio Smooth Top is an adjustable friendly hybrid mattress combines the best Individual coil unit with wool and silk for breathable comfort and four generous layers of cooling memory foam. Thermo+++ DESIGNER COVER Luxurious Phase Change Cover with Thermo+++ temperature cooling technology. The naturally healthy latex layer adds longevity, support, and coolness to the mattress. Cool gel technology is infused in the memory foam helping to reduce motion transfer and delivering reliable pressure relief where it's needed most. Our exclusive Back SupporterTM technology improves circulation and equalizes pressure distribution. SuperEdge Plus TM creates a stable sleeping area across the entire surface of the mattress. This is all topped with a wool and silk layer, giving that comfortable, cozy feel you love in a mattress. Get the great night's sleep you deserve with this multi-layered hybrid mattress.
short_description: Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Supporter Rio Smooth Top
meta_title: Spring Air Platinum Hybrid Back Supporter Rio Smooth Top

  • Breathable Mess Spacer - Spacer Material allows mattress to breath for comfort and longevity

,features=
  • Thermo+++ Phase Change Cover with Thermo+++ Temperature Control Technology that wicks moisture and heat away
  • Exceptional Back Support: The Spring Air Back Supporter offers a center-support design for pressure relief and weight distribution.
  • Cool Gel Memory Foam that provides Head-to-Toe Support that dissipates motion
  • 3" Foam Encasement for lasting edge-to-edge support.
  • Breathable Mess air spacer that encourages air circulation for comfort and longevity
  • High Density Supportive Foam for comfort and support
  • Zoned, Individually Pocketed Coils for individual support and less motion transfer
,product_line=Hybrid Platinum Back Supporter,support_layers=

  • Zoned Pocketed Coils - Zoned Power Packed Individually Pocketed Coils

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/iComfort Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /iComfort Hybrid
name: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 100 Firm
description: The Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 100 Firm mattress is the next level of comfort, cooling, and pressure-relieving support with cushion firm memory foam. Combining multiple layers of foam, memory foam, and gel memory foam with TempActiv™ cooling technology. The mattress combines a dense 8.75” support core with three comfort layers. The top layer is created using 1” Serta PillowSoft Aire and .5” Serta Pillowsoft foam providing a very comforting feel. The next layer is .75” TempActive Max Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Lastly, a 1” layer of Serta Balanced Support Foam provides maximum support and allows for a supportive yet comfortable mattress. You get a medium-firm feel that’s ideal for sleepers with back pain along with those who want to prevent it. The mattress is 12” thick.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/iComfort Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /iComfort Hybrid
name: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 300 Plush
description: The Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 300 Plush mattress is the next level of comfort, cooling, and pressure-relieving support with cushion firm memory foam. Combining multiple layers of foam, memory foam, and gel memory foam with TempActiv™ cooling technology. The mattress combines a dense 8.75” support core with four comfort layers. The top layer is created using 1.25” Serta PillowSoft HD and .5” Serta PillowSoft foam providing a very comforting feel. The next layer is 2” EverCool Fuze Gel Memory Foam to better dissipate heat providing a cooler feeling mattress. The 3rd layer is .75” TempActive Max Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Lastly, a 1” layer of EverCool Gel Foam provides additional cooling support. The mattress is 14” thick.

name: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 1000 Luxury Firm Extreme Pillowtop
description: The Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 1000 Luxury Firm Extreme Pillowtop mattress is the next level of comfort, cooling, and pressure-relieving support with cushion firm memory foam pillowtop. Combining multiple layers of foam, memory foam, and gel memory foam with TempActiv™ cooling technology. The mattress combines a dense 8.75” support core with three comfort layers. The top layer is created using 1.25” Serta PillowSoft HD and .5” Serta Support Foam providing a very comforting feel. The next layer is 2” TempActive Max Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Lastly, a 2” layer of Serta Support Memory Foam yielding a more comfortable mattress that is 14.5” thick

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/iComfort Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /iComfort Hybrid
name: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Firm
description: The Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 firm mattress is the next level of comfort, cooling, and pressure-relieving support with cushion firm memory foam. Combining multiple layers of foam, memory foam, and gel memory foam with TempActiv™ cooling technology, the Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 mattress answers all the questions you might have about whether a memory foam mattress is the one for you.” The mattress combines a dense 10” support core with four comfort layers. The top layer is created using 1.25” Serta PillowSoft HD and .25” Serta Pillowsoft Aire providing a very comforting feel. The next layer is 2” TempActive Max Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Third we have Serta Micro Hybrid Coil System which is .5” thick and allows for additional support evenly spaced throughout the mattress to avoid an overly firm feel. Lastly, a .5” layer of EverCool Fuse Memory Foam provides maximum breathability and allows air to flow freely in order to eliminate heat buildup. You get a medium-firm feel that’s ideal for sleepers with back pain along with those who want to prevent it. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, this Serta 1000 mattress makes pressure points vanish while providing the support you need for optimal spinal alignment. And with cooling technology built in to the comfort layers and the non-quilted cover, taking advantage of memory foam comfort is no sweat. The mattress is 14.5” thick.
meta_title: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Firm

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/iComfort Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /iComfort Hybrid
name: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Plush
description: The Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Plush mattress is the next level of comfort, cooling, and pressure-relieving support with cushion firm memory foam. Combining multiple layers of foam, memory foam, and gel memory foam with TempActiv™ cooling technology, the Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 mattress answers all the questions you might have about whether a memory foam mattress is the one for you. The mattress combines a dense 10.5” support core with four comfort layers. The top layer is created using 1.25” Serta PillowSoft HD and .25” Serta Pillowsoft Aire providing a very comforting feel. The next layer is 2” TempActive Max Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Third we have Serta Micro Hybrid Coil System which is .5” thick and allows for additional support evenly spaced throughout the mattress to avoid an overly firm feel. Lastly, a .5” layer of EverCool Fuse Memory Foam provides maximum breathability and allows air to flow freely in order to eliminate heat buildup. You get a medium-firm feel that’s ideal for sleepers with back pain along with those who want to prevent it. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, this Serta 1000 mattress makes pressure points vanish while providing the support you need for optimal spinal alignment. And with cooling technology built in to the comfort layers and the non-quilted cover, taking advantage of memory foam comfort is no sweat. The mattress is 15” thick.
meta_title: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Plush
meta_keywords: Serta iComfort Hybrid Blue Fusion 3000 Plush

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/iComfort,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /iComfort
name: Serta iComfort Blue Max 1000 Firm
description: Serta’s iComfort Blue Max 1000 Firm mattress is part of the popular Serta iComfort series. It is recognized for its ability to provide adequate support, without sacrificing comfort or quality. Evercool memory foam ensures that the mattress remains cool in the summer months, allowing for a more comfortable sleep. The mattress combines a dense 6” support core with five different comfort layers, each designed to provide benefits in terms of things like comfort, pressure relief, breathability and sufficient support for tired, achy muscles. The top layer is created using 1” TempActive Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Next, a 1.5” layer of Deep Reaction Memory Foam provides maximum support and comfort. Third is a 1” layer of Serta Support Foam adding support to ensuring the firm feel. Fourth is 1” Evercool Fuze Gel Memory Foam provides maximum breathability and allows air to flow freely in order to eliminate heat build up. Lastly is a 2” layer of Serta ActiveBalanced Support Foam lifts and supports every curve of your body – resulting in a pain-free sleep. The mid-level, premium-grade mattress boasts 14 inches in thickness.

name: Serta iComfort Blue Max 5000 Elite Luxury Firm
description: Serta’s iComfort Blue Max 5000 Elite Luxury Firm mattress is part of the popular Serta iComfort series. It is recognized for its ability to provide adequate support, without sacrificing comfort or quality. Evercool memory foam ensures that the mattress remains cool in the summer months, allowing for a more comfortable sleep. The mattress combines a dense 6” support core with five different comfort layers, each designed to provide benefits in terms of things like comfort, pressure relief, breathability and sufficient support for tired, achy muscles. The top layer is created using 1” TempActive Gel Memory Foam to better regulate core body temperature and to encourage a peaceful, comfortable full-night’s sleep. Next, a 1.5” layer of Deep Reaction Memory Foam provides maximum support and comfort. Third is 1.5” is a second layers of Deep Reaction Memory Foam. Fourth is a 2” layer of Serta ActiveBalanced Support Foam lifts and supports every curve of your body – resulting in a pain-free sleep. Lastly is a 1.5” Air Suspension Technology layer to provide the ultimate in comfort. The premium-grade mattress boasts 13.5 inches in thickness.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Mattresses for Less Private Label,Default Category/Mattresses/Mattresses for Less Private Label/Enedelia,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Mattresses For Less Private Label,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Mattresses For Less Private Label/Enedelia
name: Mattress for Less Private Label Enedelia Firm
description: The "Enedelia Firm" is a thick, sturdy and firmmattress that combines many elements that contribute to support and longevity but keeps a lofty, soft feel. Gel-infused Memory Foam is the industry standard when it comes to offering the contouring body support while simultaneously keeping body heat down. Super Soft Foam adds some softness to that pressure point-relieving quality. A foam encased perimeter reduces motion transfer and provides edge support. Platinumrest Pocket Springs contour to each person perfectly, delivering personalized support.

description: The "Enedelia Plush" is a thick, sturdy plush mattress that combines many elements that contribute to support and longevity but keeps a lofty, soft feel. Gel-infused Memory Foam is the industry standard when it comes to offering the contouring body support while simultaneously keeping body heat down. Super Soft Foam adds some softness to that pressure point-relieving quality. A foam encased perimeter reduces motion transfer and provides edge support. Platinumrest Pocket Springs contour to each person perfectly, delivering personalized support.

name: Corsicana Crazy Quilt Foam
description: The Corsicana Crazy Quilt mattress gives you an all foam low profile mattress, which is great for bunk beds, trundle beds or anywhere else a low price, low profile mattress would work. This mattress is always changing the look but not the feel as the manufacturer uses a variety of covers.

description: The Hotel Motel mattress is designed to provide a mattress at a minimum investment. A low profile, at only 6", it will fit under most beds on a trundle or in a bunk bed. The Foxdale Valley Luxury Firm mattress features a foam encased edge support system designed to provide a supportive seating edge while maximizing the mattress's sleeping surface. Uniform distribution of gel throughout the foam helps provide comfort and support. A soft, quality foam located at the surface with an open cell structure helps provide air flow, performance and durability. The InfiniCool Surface is designed with cooling materials uniquely positioned just beneath the surface to move heat away from the body up to 20% better while you fall asleep.

name: Innova Rejoice Adjustable Bed
description:
Innova Rejoice adjustable bed comes with many features to improve your sleep and functionality in and out of the bed. It includes wireless remote controls with flashlight and easy link remote system, head and foot lift system, two memory positions, emergency battery backup, Multi-Remote Capability, Gravity Down actuators, emergency lowering, One-Touch Flat button, and emergency battery.

name: Innova Crown King 1 Piece Adjustable Bed
description: Innova Crown King 1 Piece adjustable bed comes with many features to improve your sleep and functionality in and out of the bed. It includes wireless remote controls with flashlight and easy link remote system, head and foot lift system, two memory positions, emergency battery backup, Easy Link Remote Sync, Multi-Remote Capability, Gravity Down actuators, emergency lowering, One-Touch Flat button, and emergency battery. It has 2” rails that support a 900 pound capacity, legs that are adjustable at 4”, 6”, or 10” heights and comes with a 1 year full warranty and 20 year limited warranty. Dimensions are 75.5" W x 79.5" D x 16" H.

name: Serta Motion Essentails III Adjustable Bed
description:
The Serta Motion Essentials III Adjustable Base features an Upgraded six-button wireless remote which allows you to raise and lower the head and foot of the mattress which is of zero clearance design. Upgraded version includes one touch Zero G® Preset Position button. It is having high performance lifting capacity and also have emergency built-in batteries. When articulated the head and foot motors gradually increase in power due to smooth power™ lifting system.

name: Beautyrest SmartMotion Base 1.0 Adjustable Bed
description:
The SmartMotion Base 1.0 from Beautyrest is an advanced new sleep optimization system with highly accurate multistage sleep tracking. It provides you with a rejuvenating sleep experience. Benefits include adjustable head and foot angles, mattLock mattress retention system, This Base lets you find your most comfortable position for a better, more refreshed you. The Integrated sensors capture precise readings of awake time, light sleep, deep sleep and REM sleep throughout the night, uncovering the full depth of your sleep patterns and ways to improve them. Enjoy added USB & Power Outlets, for more freedom with your accessories such as cell phone & tablets.

Split vs Divided King? Click here to learn more.

description: The Austin Group Isabella Bedroom Set is a reflection of character and the Isabella collection makes a bold character statement in any bedroom with its formal design. Traditional design styles including square finials, intricate wood detailing, matching curved paneling on the headboard and mirror, and bracket feet on a rich brown finish create plenty of character. The collection is constructed with Pine hardwood solids and veneers and front and back English dovetail drawer construction with felt lined top drawers and dust proof panels on the bottom drawers, providing extra durability and quality

name: Montarosa 6 Piece Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Austin Group Nightstand)
description: The Montarosa Bedroom Set easily creates a distinctive space with its highly decorative take on traditional and Baroque inspired style. The sophisticated design of the headboard creates an awe-inspiring presence and draws attention with an elegant carving along the top. Button-tufted polyurethane adds a soft backing for extra comfort that helps increase the visual appeal of the design. Twisted rope accents flank each side of the headboard and are also found throughout the collection to give it a cohesive look. This set’s elaborate details and rich walnut finish further contribute to its traditional design.

description: The Avalon Kaleidoscope Bedroom Set has a unique design and provides a special ambiance not only by its beauty, but with its red, white, and blue (RWB) LED remote controlled lighting strip feature that also has a combined RWB which appears pink. Dazzling nickel pull and glass knob hardware accentuates the shimmering overall platinum finish with shagreen panels and the stunning mirrored horizontal strip design element. Another special feature is that the interior drawer side and back panels are painted in our unique Avalon Red. The group also offers a vanity with comfortable stool that is the perfect addition to any bedroom.

description: The Austin Group Isabella Bed is the centerpiece of a traditional bedroom which should signify strong character and that is exactly what this bed does. The pronounced, rounded headboard makes a bold statement that is supported by the four post square finials and intricate wood detailing on the headboard and footboard and with Square Finials and Round Headboard. The Pine hardwood solids and veneers are finished in a rich brown that further establishes the traditional tone of this bed.

name: Beautyrest SmartMotion Base 2.0 Adjustable Bed
description:
The SmartMotion Base 2.0 from Beautyrest is an advanced new sleep optimization system with highly accurate multistage sleep tracking. It provides you with a rejuvenating sleep experience. Benefits include adjustable head and foot angles, mattLock mattress retention system, This Base lets you find your most comfortable position for a better, more refreshed you. The Integrated sensors capture precise readings of awake time, light sleep, deep sleep and REM sleep throughout the night, uncovering the full depth of your sleep patterns and ways to improve them. Enjoy the added features of Snore Relief, 6 level massage system and 2 preset memory positions.   

Split vs Divided King? Click here to learn more.

description:
The Beautyrest SmartMotion Base 3.0 is an advanced new sleep optimization system. It comes with accurate multistage sleep tracking functions. The smartmotion base provides you with a rejuvenating sleep experience. It brings adjustable head and foot angles, mattLock mattress retention system. This Base lets you find your most comfortable position for a better refreshment. The Integrated sensors capture precise readings of awake time. It also light/deep/REM sleep throughout the night. Also uncovering the full depth of your sleep patterns and ways to improve them. Enjoy the added features of Snore Relief, 6 level massage system and 2 preset memory positions with added USB & Power Outlets enjoy your accessories such as cell phone & tablets.

Split vs Divided King? Click here to learn more.

description: The Austin Group Isabella Dresser Mirror Set is a classic design of this nine drawer dresser allows it to stand out and add to the beauty of the bedroom. Noted for the intricate wood detailing, curved paneling and bracket feet on a rich brown finish, the traditional style of this dresser is very elegant. categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Bamboo Copper Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Bamboo Copper Series
name: MLILY Vitality+
description: The MLILY Vitality+ bed is a 12” four-layer bed that will allow you to wake up refreshed, ready to tackle the challenges of the day, making the most of your life, that is the inspiration behind the Vitality by MLILY. A true medium feel and one of the most popular models in our lineup, the Vitality+ is a classic memory foam design with the added bonus of rayon from bamboo infused memory foam quilted into the cover. Bamboo charcoal, a semi-open cell structure, and premium fabrics treated with aloe vera, maximize cooler sleep. The Vitality is among the best values, and boasts the greatest appeal on the market today. Everyone deserves better sleep and the energy to live life to the fullest. MLILY's Vitality offers just that at a price point everyone can afford. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Quilted Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Our Performance Memory Foam is infused with Bamboo Charcoal, quilted into the cover, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature al while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. This layer is specially quilted for further comfort. 1″ The 3rd layer is Copper Infused Memory Foam. Our Mlily Memory Foam is specially infused with copper, enhancing temperature control and hypoallergenic properties to create a sleep surface which adapts to your body’s natural contours. 3″. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our custom Flex Support Foam to provide a supportive base to the whole mattress, culminating in a cooler, more complete night’s sleep. 8".

name: MLILY Serenity+
description: The MLILY Serenty+ Mattress is a bamboo and copper infused 13” five-layer memory foam bed designed to give you an amazing nights sleep with comfortable support and improved circulation. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit, double jacquard fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Quilted Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Our Performance Memory Foam is infused with Bamboo Charcoal, quilted into the cover, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature all while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. This layer is specially quilted for further comfort. 0.5″. The 3rd layer is Copper Infused Memory Foam. Our MLILY Memory Foam is specially infused with copper, enhancing temperature control and hypoallergenic properties to create a sleep surface which adapts to your body’s natural contours. 2″. Layer 4 is Performance Memory Foam. Performance Memory Foam is designed to improve oxygen and blood circulation, allowing you to achieve the deep, regenerative sleep you need to perform at your peak. 3″. The 5th and bottom layer is Airtech Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our aerodynamically engineered AirTech Support Foam, which is castellated to improve air flow and to provide a cooler, more complete night’s sleep. 7.5″.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series
name: MLILY Fusion Ortho
description: The MLILY Fusion Ortho is a 10.5" five-layer hybrid memory foam mattress that is designed with our signature AirCell Foam, Performance Memory Foam, and temperature-regulating technology, this mattress is breathable and comfortable. Pocket Springs are carefully layered onto our Flex Support Foam to relieve the natural pressure of body weight, allowing The Fusion Ortho to provide a deeper, more regenerative night’s sleep. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is MLILY AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to provide a unique layer of our supreme Performance Memory Foam infused with our breathable, temperature-regulating AirCell Technology. 1.5”. The 3rd layer is Flex Comfort Foam. Our Flex Comfort Foam adds an additional layer of comfort to create a more supple feel. 1.5”. The 4th layer is Pocket Springs. It’s one thing to have Memory Foam, it’s another to carefully layer in Pocket Springs. 800 of our extra-thick Ortho series springs form the core of this mattress. Since it’s an Ortho, this layer is firmer to provide further back and joint support. 6.3”. The 5th layer is Flex Support Border. Our Flex Support Border is built to provide corner-to-corner support, relieving the natural pressure of your body weight. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our Flex Support Foam to provide corner to corner support, ensuring a deeper, more regenerative night’s sleep. 1″.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series
name: MLILY Fusion Supreme
description: The Mlily Fusion Supreme is a 11.5” seven-layer hybrid memory foam that is comfort superior to all others, The Fusion Supreme is a smart choice for anyone looking to control their sleep. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam provides a unique breathable layer in addition to the temperature regulating Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam which delivers a cooler night’s rest. With Flex Comfort Foam and Pocket Springs carefully layered over our Flex Support Foam, the Fusion Supreme will leave you feeling refreshed and empowered to take on the day. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Mlily AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to provide a unique layer of our supreme Performance Memory Foam infused with our breathable, temperature-regulating AirCell Technology. 1.5”. The 3rd layer is Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Our Performance Memory Foam is infused with Bamboo Charcoal, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. 1.5”. Layer 4 is Flex Comfort Foam. Our Flex Comfort Foam adds an additional layer of comfort to create a more supple feel. 1”. Layer 5 is Pocket Springs. It’s one thing to have Memory Foam, it’s another to carefully layer in Pocket Springs. 1000 of our X-springs bring out the performance of this mattress. 6.3”. The 6th layer is Flex Support Border, our Flex Support Border is built to provide corner-to-corner support, relieving the natural pressure of your body weight. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our Flex Support Foam to provide corner-to-corner support, ensuring a deeper, more regenerative night’s sleep. 1”.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Fusion Hybrid Series
name: MLILY Fusion Luxe
description: The splendid comfort of our Mlily Fusion Luxe is a 12.5” seven-layer hybrid memory foam mattress featuring the signature feel of Mlily Smart Foam, a breathable synthetic latex that actively adapts to your body’s natural contours. This mattress is also encased with a signature Ice-Fabric cover that provides a cooler sleep surface all night. The top layer is Cooling Fabric, our cool knit fabric is designed to enhance air-flow and breathability, creating a cooler, more complete sleep. The 2nd layer is Mlily Gel AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to provide a unique layer of our supreme Performance Memory Foam infused with our breathable, temperature-regulating AirCell Technology. 1.5”. The 3rd layer is Mlily Smart Foam. Specially crafted Smart Foam is breathable, flexible, and actively adapts to your body’s natural contours. It provides all the benefits of latex while being allergy free. 1.5”. The 4th layer is Zoned Aero-Flex Foam. We’ve added a unique layer of our Zoned Aero-Flex Foam that is aerodynamically designed to provide consistent air-flow and adaptability. 1.5. Layer 5 is Pocket Springs. It’s one thing to have Memory Foam, it’s another to carefully layer in Pocket Springs. 1000 of our soft Series X-springs bring out the performance of this mattress. 6.3”. Layer 6 is Flex Support Border, our Flex Support Border is built to provide corner-to-corner support, relieving the natural pressure of your body weight. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam, we’ve added a final layer of our Flex Support Foam to provide corner-to-corner support, ensuring a deeper, more regenerative night’s sleep. 1.5”.

name: MLILY Harmony+
description: The MLILY Harmony+ is a 10” four-layer memory foam mattress sure to have any sleeper drifting away to dream land. The soft air+gel Dream Foam cradles the body and reduces pressure. The supportive Flex foam provides a restful, restorative sleep. End each day on the right note when sleeping on an MLILY Harmony +. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is MLILY AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to provide a unique layer of our supreme Performance Memory Foam infused with our breathable, temperature-regulating AirCell Technology. 1.5”. Layer 3 is Performance Memory Foam. Performance Memory Foam is designed to improve oxygen and blood circulation, helping you achieve the deep regenerative sleep you need. 1.5”. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our custom Flex Support Foam to provide a complete level of corner-to-corner support, delivering the deep regenerative sleep you need. 7”.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Serene Memory Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Serene Memory Series
name: MLILY Serene Ultra
description: The MLILY Serene Ultra provides a tranquil cessation to each night through its 11” five layers of memory foam. Wake up with peace of mind, knowing that a restful night’s sleep will have you performing at your best. This premium mattress has gel infused memory foam quilted into the cover. Our Dream Foam is incorporated, giving this mattress the feel of supple softness. Dream Foam has a temperature neutral air+gel that provides ventilation for a cooler night’s sleep. The Serene Ultra has layers of Flexcore foam for extra support and Flex support foam for added comfort and longevity. A serene day begins with a restful night’s sleep. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Quilted-Gel Memory Foam. Our patented MLILY Cooling Gel is infused into our specially quilted Comfort Memory Foam, creating a cooler, breathable sleep surface that adapts to you. 1”. The 3rd layer is MLILY Gel AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to be breathable and temperature regulating. We then infuse into our Performance Memory Foam to provide a unique layer of comfort.1.5”. Layer 4 is Liquid Gel FlexFoam. We’ve lined our liquid Cooling Gel into our Flex Comfort Foam for an enhanced layer of cool comfort. 1.5”. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. A final layer of our custom Flex Support Foam provides a complete level of corner-to-corner support, delivering the deep, regenerative sleep you need. 7”.

  • Mlily Gel AirCell Foam. Our specialized Gel AirCell Foam is scientifically engineered to be breathable and temperature regulating. We then infuse into our Performance Memory Foam to provide a unique layer of comfort.1.5”

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Serene Memory Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Serene Memory Series
name: MLILY Serene Elite
description: The MLILY Serene Elite is a 13” six-layer memory foam mattress that stands out in its class and gives assurance to anyone who lays upon its quilted surface that they will have an exceptional night’s rest. This mattress has temperature regulating technology to ensure a cooler night’s sleep. This is done with our infused bamboo and gel memory foam to create a noticeably cooler feel. Layered with Flexcore and convoluted flex allows for extra support and air flow. Suitable for all sleeping positions, this mattress will reduce pressure on the body producing an untroubled sleep. Experience the Serene Elite for a calm and peaceful night’s sleep. The top layer is Cooling Fabric. Our cool knit fabric is designed to enhance air-flow and breathability, creating a cooler, more complete sleep. The 2nd layer is Mlily Gel AirCell Foam with PCM. Our scientifically engineered Gel AirCell Foam incorporates NASA inspired PCM technology to create a thermo regulating sleep surface that absorbs moisture and adapts to changes in external environment. 1.5”. The 3rd layer is Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Our Comfort Memory Foam is infused with Bamboo Charcoal, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. 1.5”. The 4th layer is Liquid Gel Flex Foam. We’ve lined our liquid Cooling Gel into our Flex Comfort Foam for an enhanced layer of cool comfort. 2”. Layer 5 is Zoned Aero-Flex Foam. A final layer of Flex Support Foam provides a complete level of corner-to-corner support, delivering the deep, regenerative sleep you need. 1.5”. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. A final layer of Flex Support Foam provides a complete level of corner to corner support, delivering the deep, regenerative sleep you need. 6.5″.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series
name: MLILY Fusion 1000
description: The MLILY Fusion 1000 is a hybrid 11” seven-layer firm mattress of the Hybrid Elite series. We’ve lined our classic L series of springs into the core, setting the standard for the entire Hybrid Elite line. This is our basic performance mattress, built for durability and support. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit, double jacquard fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort with the added benefits of silver technology. The 2nd layer is Quilted Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. A layer of bamboo charcoal memory foam is quilted into the cover, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. 1″. The 3rd layer is MLILY Air-Flow Gel-Memory Layer. Our MLILY Cooling Gel is infused into our aerodynamically designed Memory Foam, creating a cooler, breathable sleeping surface that adapts to you. 1.5″. Layer 4 is Flex Comfort Foam. Flex Comfort Foam adds another layer of comfort to create a more supple feel. 1.5″. Layer 5 is Pocket Springs. We’ve designed a specially fitted Hybrid Support-spring to provide a complete and thorough foundation. 5.5″. The 6th layer is Aero-Flex Border. Our aerodynamic border is fitted to keep air-flow consistent, helping you stay cooler and get to sleep faster. It’s also built with specially moulded joints to keep support even, from the center to the very edges of your mattress. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our customer Flex Support Foam to provide an overtime level of support. 2.5″.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series
name: MLILY Fusion 2000
description: The MLILY Fusion 2000 is a 13” eight-layer hybrid mattress that is more luxurious to the Fusion 1000 mattress. We’ve implemented our soft-spring M series into a single layer, dispersing pressure and creating a softer feel of comfort. It’s not as firm as the Harmony, but it’s also not as deep as the Theatre of Dreams. This mattress is more about balance, and it is just right for someone who wants the best of both worlds. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit, double jacquard fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Quilted Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. Our Performance Memory Foam is infused with bamboo charcoal and is quilted into the cover, creating a layer that regulates moisture, odor, and temperature while adapting to your body’s individual pressure points. 1″. The 3rd layer is MLILY Air-Flow Gel-Memory Layer. Our MLILY Cooling Gel is infused into our aerodynamically designed Memory Foam, creating a cooler, breathable sleeping surface that adapts to you. 1.5″. The 4th layer is Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam. What’s better than one Bamboo Charcoal layer? Two. Our elite Performance Memory Foam is infused to create an added hypoallergenic layer that adapts to you. 1.5″. Layer 5 is Flex Comfort Foam. Our Flex Comfort Foam adds another layer of comfort to create a more supple feel. 1.5″. Layer 6 is Pocket Springs. We’ve designed a specially fitted Hybrid Support-spring to provide a complete and thorough foundation. High performance springs line the core of this mattress. 6.3″. The 7th layer is Aero-Flex Border. Our aerodynamic border is fitted to keep air-flow consistent, helping you stay cooler and get to sleep faster. It’s also built with specially moulded joints to keep support even, from the center to the very edges of your mattress. The bottom layer is Flex Support Foam. We’ve added a final layer of our custom Flex Support Foam to provide an overtime level of support. 1.2″.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY,Default Category/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/MLILY/Hybrid Elite Series
name: MLILY Theatre of Dreams
description: The MLILY Theatre of Dreams is a 13” eight-layer hybrid mattress that is part of the Hybrid Elite Series of mattresses and is a perfect combination of comfort and support. This mattress is used by Manchester United players and coaches and they have endorsed it globally. It has a been designed to improve oxygen, blood circulation, and shorten recovery time. soft supportive feel yet firm enough to provide the support needed for correct body posture in all three sleeping positions. The top layer is Double Jacquard Fabric. Our premium knit, double jacquard fabric is designed to provide advanced breathability and comfort. The 2nd layer is Ultra-Plush Gel Air-Cell Foam. We’ve added an enhanced layer of our AirCell Foam to create a cooler, more comfortable sleep surface which adapts to your body’s individual pressure points. 1.2″. The 3rd layer is Hybrid Mini Springs. Our Hybrid Mini-Springs are specially designed to individually adjust as you sleep, aligning to your body’s own natural contours. 1″. The 4th layer is MLILY Air-Flow Gel-Memory Foam. Our MLILY Cooling Gel is infused into our aerodynamically designed Memory Foam, creating a cooler, more complete sleep. 1.2″. Layer 5 is Flex Comfort Foam. Our Flex Comfort Foam adds another layer of comfort to create a more supple feel. 1.8″. The 6th layer is Pocket Springs. It’s one thing to have Memory Foam, it’s another to carefully layer in Pocket Springs. Our soft series X-springs bring out the performance of this mattress. 6.3″. Layer 7 is Aero-Flex Border. Our aerodynamic border is fitted to keep air-flow consistent, helping you stay cooler and get to sleep faster. It’s also built with specialty older joints to keep support even, from the center to the very edges of your mattress. The final layer of our custom Flex Support Foam to provide an extra layer of complete support. 1.5″.

categories: Default Category/Sleep Accessories,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Protection,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Protection/Mattress Protectors,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Protection,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Protection/Mattress Protectors
name: Malouf Sleep Tite Five 5ided Omniphase Mattress Protector
description: The Malouf Sleep Tite Five 5ided® Mattress Protector with Tencel™ + Omniphase® is the most advanced mattress protector on the market with three incorporated technologies—Tencel™, Omniphase®, and the H2Pro® membrane. Omniphase® phase change material promotes a comfortable sleeping temperature in any climate; Tencel™ fiber wicks away moisture from the body and the laboratory-certified H2Pro® liquid-proof membrane creates a quiet, and breathable barrier against allergens and dust mites. The combined benefits of these technologies means you will sleep comfortably and dry with five sides of protection for your mattress. Pillow protectors are also available to create a healthy sleeping environment.

name: Malouf Sleep Tite Encase Omniphase Mattress Protector
description: The Encase® Omniphase® mattress protector delivers six-sided protection and a cool, dry sleep environment. Patented and lab-certified technologies completely block bed bugs, liquids, allergens and dust mites. Omniphase® phase changing fabric absorbs and releases heat to create a cooler sleep surface, while Tencel™ fibers wick away moisture. Universal Fit™ design ensures a secure fit on 6" to 22" thick mattresses.

name: Malouf Sleep Tite Five 5ided Omniphase Pillow Protector
description: The Malouf Sleep Tite Five 5ided® Mattress Protector with Tencel™ + Omniphase® is the most advanced mattress protector on the market with three incorporated technologies—Tencel™, Omniphase®, and the H2Pro® membrane. Omniphase® phase change material promotes a comfortable sleeping temperature in any climate; Tencel™ fiber wicks away moisture from the body and the laboratory-certified H2Pro® liquid-proof membrane creates a quiet, and breathable barrier against allergens and dust mites. The combined benefits of these technologies means you will sleep comfortably and dry with five sides of protection for your mattress. Pillow protectors (set of two) are also available to create a healthy sleeping environment.

name: Malouf Sleep Tite Encase Omniphase Pillow Protector
description: The Encase® Omniphase® mattress protector delivers six-sided protection and a cool, dry sleep environment. Patented and lab-certified technologies completely block bed bugs, liquids, allergens and dust mites. Omniphase® phase changing fabric absorbs and releases heat to create a cooler sleep surface, while Tencel™ fibers wick away moisture. Universal Fit™ design ensures a secure fit on 6" to 22" thick mattresses. Pillow protector (set of two) are available to provide complete protection.

The luxuriously smooth fiber structure from eco-friendly resources pampers your skin with balanced moisture management and temperature regulation qualities to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Stunningly soft fibers are perfect for sensitive skin - discover deep sleep with TENCEL performance sheets. Extra deep pockets and oversized dimensions for mattress depths 6"-22" and a universal fit design with ultra-thick elastic ensures a secure fit

name: Malouf Zoned Dough® Lavender Pillow
description:
The Malouf Zoned Dough Lavender Pillis is the right softness and support, combined with natural aromatherapy, creates a truly relaxing experience. Plush, curve-conforming Dough® memory foam is infused with real lavender oil for cozy, natural relaxation. Lavender has long been used as a natural way to promote relaxation and deep sleep. A mini spritzer bottle of natural lavender aromatherapy spray accompanies the King and Queen size pillows to refresh the aroma. Zoned Technology design creates larger holes in the center of the pillow to cradle the head and smaller holes around the edges for superior neck support. A beautiful and soft Tencel™ mesh cover adds the temperature- and moisture-regulating comfort of eco-friendly fabric. Travel size pillow does not include aromatherapy spritzer.

The Malouf Zoned Dough® Lavender Travel Pillow is the right softness and support, combined with natural aromatherapy, creates a truly relaxing experience while you travel. Plush, curve-conforming Dough® memory foam is infused with real lavender oil for cozy, natural relaxation. Lavender has long been used as a natural way to promote relaxation and deep sleep. Zoned Technology design improves comfort and breathability. A beautiful and soft Tencel™ mesh cover adds the temperature- and moisture-regulating comfort of eco-friendly fabric.

name: Malouf Zoned Gel Dough® Pillow
description: The Malouf Zoned Gel Dough High Loft Pillow combines the cooling benefits of Gel Dough® with the comfort and breathability of Zones Technology™, the Zoned Gel Dough® pillow offers optimal comfort for restful sleep. The Gel Dough® formula creates a cooler, softer memory foam that maintains form for better support than traditional memory foams. Zoned Technology™ cradles the head while supporting the neck, providing exceptional airflow, making this one of the coolest, most breathable pillows available. A beautiful and soft Tencel™ mesh removeable cover adds the temperature- and moisture-regulating comfort of eco-friendly fabric.

name: Malouf Shoulder Zoned Gel Dough® Pillow
description: The Malouf Shoulder Zoned Dough® Pillow with Bamboo Charcoal brings you excellent pressure point relief, odor and moisture control, and comfort thanks to the unique shoulder design created specifically for side sleepers. Bamboo charcoal has many great qualities: it eliminates odors, absorbs excess moisture, regulates temperature, and is an excellent choice for people with allergies or asthma. Our Zoned Technology® provides optimal comfort for your head and neck to correctly align your spine. Our memory foam is free of harsh chemicals and is CertiPUR-US certified. This pillow is backed by a 5-year warranty.

name: Malouf CarbonCool® + OmniPhase® Pillow
description: The Malouf CarbonCool + Omniphase pillow is the greatest scientific advancement in the industry since memory foam, phase change material (PCM) offers continual temperature regulation for ideal sleep comfort. Our proprietary application of OmniPhase® microencapsulated phase change material has created a new category in memory foam comfort. PCM continually adjusts to body and environmental temperature to maintain the optimum sleep temperature range. Supportive memory foam is infused with graphite - known for its excellent thermal conductivity properties - to remove heat. Tiny graphite molecules in the pillow create pathways that use conduction to channel heat away from the head, face and neck. A Tencel™ mesh cover creates a soft, smooth surface that helps to control humidity while allowing for maximum exposure to the Omniphase® coating. We maximized the most advanced pillow-cooling technology available to create ideal comfort.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Black,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Black
name: Beautyrest Black L-Class Extra Firm
description: The Beautyrest Black L-Class Extra Firm Mattress features all of Simmons newest technologies including the new BlackICE 4.0 cover that controls temperature in 4 ways so, you can feel up to 2º cooler and sleep better. The L-Class Extra Firm is ideal for stomach sleepers and for those who know they prefer an extra firm overall feel. The bed has premium features like the BlackICE 4.0 that helps keep the bed cool. It also has a T3 Pocketed Coil design which is a variable stage coil to give increasing support under the heaviest part of your body. And even though this model is firmer, it does have several layers of conforming and supportive foams. The best part about this mattress is you can enjoy the benefits of investing in a luxury mattress without breaking the bank. Be more awake with a Beautyrest Black mattress and enjoy feeling refreshed and energized for whatever life throws your way.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Black,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Black
name: Beautyrest Black L-Class Plush
description: The Beautyrest Black L Class Plush Mattress is one of two mattresses in the Beautyrest Black collection this year that has a truly neutral level of comfort. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, this mattress is designed to offer you an excellent blend of comfort and support. This model is designed to help keep you from getting too hot. It has BlackICE 4.0 material on top to help dissipate body heat. And underneath it also has Gel Memory Foam to aid temperature management. The innerspring support is provided by individually pocketed coils Beautyrest calls T3 design referencing the variable tension in the springs. Mattress is a great value for a luxuriously soft mattress that provides exceptional comfort and support.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Black,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Black
name: Beautyrest Black L-Class Medium Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Black L Medium Pillowtop Mattress has a neutral level of comfort with a slight edge towards firm. Whether you sleep on your back, side, or stomach, this mattress is designed to offer you an excellent blend of comfort and support. It does have BlackICE 4.0 cooling material on top of several 3 layers of Medium Comfort Foam. In total it has 5 1/2" of Medium and Plush Comfort Foams making it a bed that's taller than average. Beautyrest uses premium foams in this construction which is a plus. The foam layers rest on it's T3 Pocketed Coil. A sophisticated coil design helps you feel the softness and still get firm support under the heaviest parts of your body. The top layer of the mattress has the BlackICE 4.0 material as noted above. This material is important because it helps remove excess body heat away to create a cooler environment so you can sleep better.

name: Serta iComfort Blue 100CT Gentle Firm
description: The Serta iComfort Blue 100CT Gentle Firm Mattress has all the bells and whistles you could want in a mattress. TempActiv™ gel memory foam which is great for temperature regulation, this mattress really has you covered for a wonderful night's sleep. Plus, a layer of EverCool® Fuze™ Gel Memory Foam helps enhance breathability to promote airflow and further reduce heat buildup.

name: Serta iComfort Blue 300CT Firm
description: The Serta iComfort Blue 300CT Firm Mattress features a layer of supportive, highly-dense memory foam designed to deliver a firmer feel. Two additional layers of cooling gel and gel memory foam help dissipate heat and cradle you from the moment you lie down. To complement those cooling, supportive layers, the fabric cover gives you an instant, cool-to-the-touch sensation, keeping you comfortable all night long.

description: The Serta iComfort Blue 300CT Plush Mattress features three different types of EverCool® foam on top of a dense, all-foam support core. categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Hybrid ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Hybrid
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Firm Pillowtop
description: This Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Firm Pillowtop Mattress offers custom support with the 1,000 Edition Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium fabric provide pressure point relief. Additional heat-regulating fabric with instant cool to the touch feel. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

  • 1000 Edition Custom Support® Coil System, individually wrapped coils deliver unparalleled support and less motion transfer.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Hybrid ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Hybrid
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Plush Pillowtop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Plush Pillow Top Mattress features a luxe, cool-to-the-touch cover and Serta’s all-new comfort system for better pressure-point relief than ever before. An advanced custom coil system helps reduce motion transfer and provide support on all four sides of the mattress. A substantial layer of cooling gel memory foam dissipates heat to give you a sleep experience that’s as cooling as it is comfortable.
short_description: Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Plush Pillowtop
meta_title: Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Plush Pillowtop
meta_keywords: Serta Perfect Sleeper Hybrid Standale II Plush Pillowtop

,features=
  • CoolFeel™ Fabric, A luxurious, breathable cover that's as cool as it feels.
  • Cool Twist® Gel Memory Foam features cooling gel swirled into premium memory foam that helps enhance airflow
  • HyperTouch™ Comfort, a combination of specialized foam, engineered fibers and premium stretch fabric for total body cradling and better pressure point relief.
  • 1000 Edition Custom Support® Coil System, individually wrapped coils deliver unparalleled support and less motion transfer.

name: Serta SleepTrue Carrollton Firm
description: The Serta SleepTrue Carrollton Firm Mattress features a layer of CoolTwist® gel foam designed to promote airflow and heat dissipation, and the Continuous Support® innerspring that will reduce motion transfer while giving you outstanding body support. This mattress will bring you all the support and comfort you need to get a good night sleep.

name: Serta SleepTrue Malloy Plush Eurotop
description: The SleepTrue Malloy Plush Euro Top Mattress is a Pocketed Coil mattress built for lasting comfort. It features a layer of Cool Twist® Gel Foam over Serta's cradling coil system - with the addition of an extra-deep foam rail on the sides for reduced roll-off. This blend of cooling and support is designed to leave you in comfy, pressure-relieving bliss, whether you sleep in the middle or right on the edge.

name: Beautyrest Black L-Class Plush Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Black L-Class Plush Pillow Top Mattress seamlessly integrates luxury and technology for an indulgent sleep experience. This mattress features BLACKICE™ 4.0 TECHNOLOGY to feel Cooler and Sleep Better. BlackIce™ 4.0 Immediately cools and regulates temperature through the night. Technoluxe foams within the mattress reduce pressure points in your hips and shoulders to help you sleep more comfortable. It has the latest in pressure relieving memory foams which provides you a soft bed.

name: Beautyrest Black C-Class Medium
description: The Beautyrest Black C-Class Medium Mattress perfectly combines luxury and technology for an indulgent sleep experience far beyond mere comfort. It’s about sleep that indulges the senses. Sleep that refuses to compromise. Sleep that’s so completely restorative and inspiring, it borders on the sacred. Explore the distinctive elements that compose the Beautyrest Black sleep experience. A bed is an intimate choice—and it’s no coincidence that our high performance fabrics play a key part. When combined with our T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. More high quality memory foams than any other Beautyrest mattress to eliminate pressure points in hips and shoulders.

name: Beautyrest Black C-Class Plush
description: The Beautyrest Black C-Class Plush Mattress perfectly combines luxury and technology for an indulgent sleep experience far beyond mere comfort. It’s about sleep that indulges the senses. Sleep that refuses to compromise. Sleep that’s so completely restorative and inspiring, it borders on the sacred. Explore the distinctive elements that compose the Beautyrest Black sleep experience. A bed is an intimate choice—and it’s no coincidence that our high performance fabrics play a key part. When combined with our T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. More high quality memory foams than any other Beautyrest mattress to eliminate pressure points in hips and shoulders.

name: Beautyrest Black C-Class Medium Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest C-Class Medium Pillowtop mattress is a great mattress for people who want the soft comfort of a pillowtop mattress but with firm underlying support. Be more awake with a Beautyrest Black and enjoy the luxury of pressure relieving, cooling comfort. This mattress like all Beautyrest Blacks have T3 Pocketed Coil Technology which utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. More high quality memory foams than any other Beautyrest mattress to eliminate pressure points in hips and shoulders.

name: Beautyrest Black C-Class Plush Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Black C-Class Plush Pillowtop Mattress is designed to provide a very soft sleep experience with firm functional support. It features Simmons newest cooling BlackICE 4.0 cover and pressure relieving RightTemp Memory Foam to create an exceptionally superior mattress. The T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. More high quality memory foams than any other Beautyrest mattress to eliminate pressure points in hips and shoulders. This mattress is one of the softest Beautyrest Black available that is designed to provide luxuriously soft comfort and pressure relieving support. If you are a side and/or back sleeper looking for a pillowtop mattress with soft lavish body contouring and support then this mattress would be a perfect choice.

name: Beautyrest Black K-Class Medium
description:
The Beautyrest Black K-Class Medium Mattress is the top of the line medium mattress in this lineup. It features all of Simmons newest innovations and technologies. Like all other Beautyrest Black mattresses it features cooling BlackICE 4.0 cover and pressure relieving RightTemp Memory Foam to create an exceptionally superior mattress. T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature.
The addition of 2,000 additional Nano Coils gives the upper-level K-class Beautyrest Black mattresses enhanced conformability and pressure relief.
If you are looking for a mattress that provides deluxe support and pressure relieving comfort that is luxuriously firm with some softness then this mattress would be a perfect choice for you.

name: Beautyrest Black K-Class Firm Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Black K-Class Firm Pillowtop Mattress is the most unique pillowtop mattress Simmons has to offer. Most pillowtop mattresses have a medium soft to ultra soft feel but, the K-Class Firm pillowtop has an overall firm feeling with a cozy medium soft top. It features all of Simmons newest innovations and technologies. Like all other Beautyrest Black mattresses it features cooling BlackICE 4.0 cover and pressure relieving RightTemp Memory Foam to create an exceptionally superior mattress. T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. The addition of 2,000 additional Nano Coils gives the upper-level K-class Beautyrest Black mattresses enhanced conformability and pressure relief. If you are looking for a mattress that provides unparalleled cooling, deluxe support and contouring pressure relieving comfort that is luxuriously firm with some softness then this mattress would be a perfect choice for you.

T3 Pocketed Coil Technology utilizes a triple strand coil to provide triple the support and durability. Feel cooler and sleep better as the most advanced cooling technology maintains ideal temperature. The addition of 2,000 additional Nano Coils gives the upper-level K-class Beautyrest Black mattresses enhanced conformability and pressure relief. If you are looking for a mattress that provides unparalleled cooling, deluxe support and contouring pressure relieving comfort and very soft then this mattress would be a perfect choice for you.

name: Malouf TENCEL Split California King Sheets
description: Malouf TENCEL Sheets are silky soft and naturally pure, Woven™ TENCEL bed linens will ensure your sleep is refreshingly comfortable. The luxuriously smooth fiber structure from eco-friendly resources pampers your skin with balanced moisture management and temperature regulation qualities to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter. Stunningly soft fibers are perfect for sensitive skin - discover deep sleep with TENCEL performance sheets. Extra deep pockets and oversized dimensions for mattress depths 6"-22" and a universal fit design with ultra-thick elastic ensures a secure fit

name: Mantua Insta-Lock Twin/Full/Twin XL Bed Frame
description: The Mantua Insta-Lock bed frame series is made from steel to be strong and durable. The Insta-Lock design of the I-34G provides the box spring with a secure and stable fit. Because no tools are needed for assembly, setup is fast and easy. Adjusts to fit Twin, Full, or Twin XL beds and includes four legs with rollers for ease of moving the bed. Supports up to 1200 pounds.

name: Mantua Insta-Lock Queen/King/Cal King Bed Frame
description: Mantua's Insta-Lock bed frame series has provided unmatched security and stability for box springs and mattresses. The deluxe I-PK470 provides the box spring with heavy-duty support. Because no tools are needed for assembly, setup is quick and easy. Adjusts to fit Queen, King, or California King size beds. Includes a center rail and six legs with glides. Four legs include rug rollers for mobility. The center legs use glides for increased stability. It supports up to 1200 pounds.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Extra Firm
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Extra Firm mattress is designed with those in mind who need a lots of support. With the dual cool cover helps sleep thermal neutral and being an antimicrobial performance layer that works to keep your mattress fresh and cool while moving heat and moisture away so you sleep at your ideal sleeping temperature, the three layers of conforming foams including a premium center third of gel memory foam for comfort and support as well as 900 series pocketed coils that provide flexible support precisely where you need it and isolates movement between two sleepers. Most people will find this mattress uncomfortable but if you prefer extra support you can't beat the value in this mattress.

name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Medium Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Medium Pillow Top mattress is designed with those in mind who need a little more support but enjoy the softness of a pillowtop. With the dual cool cover helps sleep thermal neutral and being an antimicrobial performance layer that works to keep your mattress fresh and cool while moving heat and moisture away so you sleep at your ideal sleeping temperature, the five layers of conforming foams including a premium center third of gel memory foam for comfort and support as well as 900 series pocketed coils that provide flexible support precisely where you need it and isolates movement between two sleepers. You will sleep great on this medium pillowtop mattress.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Plush Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Plush Pillow Top mattress is the softest, and tallest, mattress in the BRS900 collection of beds. With the dual cool cover helps sleep thermal neutral and being an antimicrobial performance layer that works to keep your mattress fresh and cool while moving heat and moisture away so you sleep at your ideal sleeping temperature, the five layers of conforming foams including a premium center third of gel memory foam for comfort and support as well as 900 series pocketed coils that provide flexible support precisely where you need it and isolates movement between two sleepers. You will sleep great on this plush pillowtop mattress.

,features=

  • AirCool Foam-A layer of conforming foam that also helps to help keep the mattress cooler. It promotes airflow to help accomplish the cooler results.
  • Gel Memory Foam-This gel memory foam layer has cooling properties inherent in gel - located on the center third of a foam layer.
  • 900 Series Pocketed Coil-Individually pocketed coils are great because they provide precise support on each part of your body.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900-C Medium Pillowtop
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900-C Medium Pillowtop Mattress features a cooling moisture wicking cover as well as Dynamic Response Memory Foam which you will only find in Simmons top of line Beautyrest Black and Beautyrest Hybrid mattresses. Dynamic Response Memory Foam is a deep cushioning, responsive memory foam that adds additional supportive comfort and bounce to the mattress so, you can freely change positions during the night. The 900 Series Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology provides flexible support precisely where it is needed and isolates motion between two sleepers. This mattress provides a firmer level of support for those who need just a little more firmness. The pillowtop provides a softer feel that helps reduce pressure on the body.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • DualCool Plus Technology

  • 2" Medium Comfort Foam

  • 2" Firm Comfort Foam
,comfort_level=Medium Pillowtop,core_construction=Memory Foam|Pocketed Coil,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=

  • Dual Cool Plus Cover - Cooling and moisture wicking materials on the cover help to keep the mattress cool and dry for more comfortable sleep.
  • Dynamic Response Memory Foam - Among various layers of comforting foams, there is a layer of memory foam to help the mattress conform to your body's curves.
  • 900 Series Pocketed Coil - An individually pocketed coil design helps provide targeted support. It is soft in areas with little weight and yet it also gives solid support under heavier areas like your hips.
,product_line=Beautyrest Silver,support_layers=

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest
name: Beautyrest BR800 Medium
description: The Beautyrest BR800 Medium Mattress is one of five in the beautyrest collection. It begins with a Dual Cool Cover to keep you cool by aiding the AirCool and memory foam layers in providing comfort and coolness. It has Pocketed Coil innerspring support ensuring you get pinpointed support under every part of your body and also helps minimize motion transfer, so you don't feel other people getting in or out of bed as much. This mattress has a medium feel that leans toward the softer side.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • DualCool Technology
  • 1" AirCool Foam
  • 1" AirCool Foam
  • 1" Plush Comfort Foam
,comfort_level=Medium,core_construction=Memory Foam|Pocketed Coil,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Twin - 38" W x 75" L x 12" H
  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 12" H
  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 12" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 12" H
  • Twin XL - 38" W x 80" L x 12" H
  • California King - 72" W x 84" L x 12" H
,features=
  • Dual Cool Cover-The cooling layer under the cover. These fibers help flow heat away from you.
  • 800 Series Pocketed Coil-Individually pocketed coils are great because they provide precise support on each part of your body.
  • Gel Memory Foam-This gel memory foam layer has cooling properties inherent in gel - located on the center third of a foam layer.
  • Beautyedge-The edge of the mattress is reinforced so you can sleep comfortably up to the edge of the mattress as well as comfortably sit on the edge of the bed.
,product_line=Beautyrest,support_layers=
  • 800 Series Plush Pocketed Coil
  • 1" Energy Foam
  • Coil Gauge: 14.75
  • BeautyEdge Foam Encased Edge
,ts_dimensions_height=12.0000

name: Beautyrest BR800 Firm
description: The Beautyrest BR800 Firm Mattress is one of five in the beautyrest collection. It begins with a Dual Cool Cover to keep you cool by aiding the three comfort foam layers in providing comfort and coolness. There is a gel memory foam center third support to provide additional support right where you need it. It has Pocketed Coil innerspring support ensuring you get pinpointed support under every part of your body and also helps minimize motion transfer, so you don't feel other people getting in or out of bed as much. This mattress has a firm feel and is in the far end of the five mattresses in terms of hardness.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest
name: Beautyrest BR800 Plush Eurotop
description: The Beautyrest BR800 Plush Eurotop Mattress is one of five in the beautyrest collection. It begins with a Dual Cool Cover to keep you cool by aiding the two AirCool and plush comfort foam layers in providing comfort and coolness. There is a gel memory foam center third support to provide additional support right where you need it. It has Pocketed Coil innerspring support ensuring you get pinpointed support under every part of your body and also helps minimize motion transfer, so you don't feel other people getting in or out of bed as much. This mattress has a soft feel and is in the far end of the five mattresses in terms of softness.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=

  • Dual Cool Cover-The cooling layer under the cover. These fibers help flow heat away from you.

  • Gel Memory Foam-This gel memory foam layer has cooling properties inherent in gel - located on the center third of a foam layer.
  • Beautyedge-The edge of the mattress is reinforced so you can sleep comfortably up to the edge of the mattress as well as comfortably sit on the edge of the bed.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Medium Firm
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Medium Firm Mattress is a great value and features Simmons newest cooling technologies. The DualCool Technology Cover contains silver which has natural antimicrobial and conductive properties that help keep your mattress fresh and cool while moving heat and moisture away from the surface of the mattress. Gel memory foam in the center third of the mattress provides additional back support where you need it most. This mattress incorporates the 900 Series Firm Pocketed Coil System providing enhanced conforming properties and pressure relief for individualized back support. It also has great edge support-- everything necessary to get quality sleep. This mattress is going to feel comfortable for most people. If you like a mattress that has a true medium feel with some firmness then the Beautyrest Silver 900 Medium Firm Mattress is going to be an excellent choice.

,features=

  • AirCool Foam-A layer of conforming foam that also helps to help keep the mattress cooler. It promotes airflow to help accomplish the cooler results.
  • Gel Memory Foam-This gel memory foam layer has cooling properties inherent in gel - located on the center third of a foam layer.
  • 900 Series Pocketed Coil-Individually pocketed coils are great because they provide precise support on each part of your body.
