categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Plush
description: The Beautyrest Silver BRS900 Plush Mattress is a great value and features Simmons newest cooling technologies. The DualCool Technology Cover contains silver which has natural antimicrobial and conductive properties that help keep your mattress fresh and cool while moving heat and moisture away from the surface of the mattress. Gel memory foam in the center third of the mattress provides additional back support where you need it most. This mattress incorporates the 900 Series Firm Pocketed Coil System providing enhanced conforming properties and pressure relief for individualized back support. It also has great edge support-- everything necessary to get quality sleep. This mattress is going to feel comfortable for most people. If you like a mattress that has a soft feel with solid support then the Beautyrest Silver 900 Plush Mattress is going to be an excellent choice.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900-C Extra Firm
description: The Beautyrest BRS900-C Extra Firm mattress is one of the mattresses in the C series that emphasize Support, Longevity, and Coolness. This mattress offers just enough softness in the sleeping surface over a Beautyrest Pocketed Coil® support. The coil enhances motion separation, conformability, individualized back support, and pressure relief. The Beautyrest Pocketed Coils® offer excellent motion separation when sleeping with a partner as well as enhanced conformability versus traditional wire tied coil systems. Enjoy elevated comfort with Dual Cool™ Plus Technology, enhanced with Silver designed to move both heat and moisture away from the surface of the mattress. Layers of AirCool foams, memory foams and GelTouch foams add to the comfort and support. The mattress perimeter is reinforced with Ventilated AirCool BeautyEdge® foam encasement. This offers a comfortable seating edge as well as an increase in usable sleeping surface and edge durability. This mattress has a very firm feel that is going to appeal to stomach sleepers or those that need a very firm mattress.
additional_attributes:

,features=
  • Dual Cool Plus Cover-A moisture-wicking fabric is on top of materials that help to control and transfer excess heat helping you stay cool and dry while you sleep.
  • Dynamic Response Memory Foam-Pressure relieving layer of Dynamic Response Memory Foam to help the bed feel comfortable when you sleep.
  • 900 Series Pocketed Coil the core of the support is provided by individually pocketed coils to contour and support your body's curves.
,product_line=Beautyrest Silver,support_layers=

  • BeautyEdge Foam Encased Edge

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Silver,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Silver
name: Beautyrest Silver BRS900-C Plush
description: The Beautyrest BRS900-C Plush mattress is one of the mattresses in the C series that emphasize Support, Longevity, and Coolness. This mattress offers just enough softness in the sleeping surface over a Beautyrest Pocketed Coil® support. The coil enhances motion separation, conformability, individualized back support, and pressure relief. The Beautyrest Pocketed Coils® offer excellent motion separation when sleeping with a partner as well as enhanced conformability versus traditional wire tied coil systems. Enjoy elevated comfort with Dual Cool™ Plus Technology, enhanced with Silver designed to move both heat and moisture away from the surface of the mattress. Layers of AirCool foams, memory foams and GelTouch foams add to the comfort and support. The mattress perimeter is reinforced with Ventilated AirCool BeautyEdge® foam encasement. This offers a comfortable seating edge as well as an increase in usable sleeping surface and edge durability. This mattress has a medium feel with some softness that is going to be ideal for most people.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Hybrid
name: Beautyrest Hybrid BRX1000-C Plush
description: The Beautyrest Hybrid BRX1000-C Plush is the first hybrid mattress with its ContourFit™ Design, with one goal in mind: a more conforming mattress to allow you to find your optimal sleep position. The InfiniCool™ MAX combines two Cool-to-the-Touch surface layers with a layer of RightTemp™ Memory Foam to pull heat away from the sleep surface helping keep you cool and comfortable throughout the night. Beautyrest® Hybrid enhances the benefits of our Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology and the comfort of our advanced memory foams to bring our best to your sleep – so you can Be More Awake™.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Hybrid
name: Beautyrest Hybrid BRX1000-IP Extra Firm
description: The Beautyrest Hybrid BRX1000-IP Extra Firm is the first hybrid mattress with its ContourFit™ Design, with one goal in mind: a more conforming mattress to allow you to find your optimal sleep position. The InfiniCool™ MAX combines two Cool-to-the-Touch surface layers with a layer of RightTemp™ Memory Foam to pull heat away from the sleep surface helping keep you cool and comfortable throughout the night. The HD Memory Foam and Firm Comfort Foam form to the body and provide the extra support that is preferred by those wanting a firmer mattress. Beautyrest® Hybrid enhances the benefits of our Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology and the comfort of our advanced memory foams to bring our best to your sleep – so you can Be More Awake™.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • ContourFit Design
  • InfiniCool Plus
  • 1" Beautyrest Gel Memory Foam
  • 1.5" HD Memory Foam
  • 1" Firm Comfort Foam
  • .5" GelTouch Foam
,comfort_level=Extra Firm,core_construction=Hybrid,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Twin - 38" W x 75" L x 13.5" H
  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 13.5" H
  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 13.5" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 13.5" H
  • Twin XL - 38" W x 80" L x 13.5" H
  • California King - 72" W x 84" L x 13.5" H
,features=
  • Cool to the Touch Fabric - Feel cool with cool-to-the-touch cover
  • ContourFit Design - The superior stretch and recovery surface adapts with you throughout the night, allowing you to engage more closely with the pressure relieving memory foams, for a deeper, easier sleep.
  • Beautyrest Gel Memory Foam - Memory foam infused with gel contours your body providing exceptional support
  • Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology - provides flexible support precisely where it is need and isolates motion between two sleepers
,product_line=Beautyrest Hybrid,support_layers=
  • 1000 Series Firm Pocketed Coil
  • 1.5" Energy Foam
  • Coil Gauge: 14.75
  • BeautyEdge Foam Encased Edge
,ts_dimensions_height=13.5000

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Hybrid
name: Beautyrest Hybrid BRX3000-IM Firm
description: The Beautyrest Hybrid BRX3000-IM Firm Mattress features Simmons newest cooling technologies and innovations including the new Infinicool MAX and RightTemp memory Foam so, you can sleep cool and comfortable throughout the night. An additional 2000 micro coils provide triple the support for enhanced pressure relief and contouring support. The Hybrid BRX3000-IM Firm Mattress is designed to provide a firm yet forgiving feel that is ideal for back and stomach sleepers. If you enjoy the conforming feel of memory foam mattress but also want the superior support of a traditional innerspring mattress then a Beautyrest Hybrid is going to be a great choice.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • ContourFit Design

,features=
  • RightTemp™ Memory Foam infuses highly conductive and strong carbon fiber for temperature management and durability in a pressure-relieving foam.
  • InfiniCool™ MAX combines two cool-to-the-touch surface layers with a layer of RightTemp™ Memory Foam to pull heat away from the sleep surface helping keep you cool and comfortable throughout the night.
  • ContourFit Design through BackCare 3X which is a superior stretch and recovery surface adapts with you throughout the night, allowing you to engage more closely with the pressure relieving memory foams, for a deeper, easier sleep.
  • Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology - provides flexible support precisely where it is need and isolates motion between two sleepers
,product_line=Beautyrest Hybrid,support_layers=

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest,Default Category/Mattresses/Beautyrest/Beautyrest Hybrid,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Beautyrest /Beautyrest Hybrid
name: Beautyrest Hybrid BRX3000-IM Medium
description: The Beautyrest Hybrid BRX3000-IM Medium Firm mattress is part of the all the new Hybrid Collection beds new in 2019. It's a firm feeling bed which means it is on the firm side so it will appeal to people who prefer and a harder sleeping surface. The top of the mattress features InfiniCool MAX material and RightTemp Memory Foam which work together to help regulate comfortable body temperature while you sleep. This helps to overcome a common problem with memory foam beds where they can sleep hot. A layer of HD Memory Foam firms up the bed a bit helping give it the medium firm comfort. Underneath is a pocketed coil support system they call the 1000 Series Pocketed Coil system. The pocketed coils work with the memory foam above to create the hybrid style bed. This combination makes the mattress conforming like a memory foam bed while also providing the support more typical in a traditional spring mattress. People really like this combination and hybrid mattresses have been increasing in popularity. If you looking for a firmer feeling hybrid and want a nicer model to boot, then you can consider this bed.

availability=In Stock,brand=Simmons,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • ContourFit Design

  • 1" RightTemp Memory Foam

,comfort_level=Medium,core_construction=Hybrid,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Twin - 38" W x 75" L x 15.5" H
  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 15.5" H

  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 15.5" H
  • Twin XL - 38" W x 80" L x 15.5" H
  • California King - 72" W x 84" L x 15.5" H
,features=
  • RightTemp™ Memory Foam infuses highly conductive and strong carbon fiber for temperature management and durability in a pressure-relieving foam.
  • InfiniCool™ MAX combines two cool-to-the-touch surface layers with a layer of RightTemp™ Memory Foam to pull heat away from the sleep surface helping keep you cool and comfortable throughout the night.
  • ContourFit Design through BackCare 3X which is a superior stretch and recovery surface adapts with you throughout the night, allowing you to engage more closely with the pressure relieving memory foams, for a deeper, easier sleep.
  • Beautyrest® Pocketed Coil® Technology - provides flexible support precisely where it is need and isolates motion between two sleepers
,product_line=Beautyrest Hybrid,support_layers=
  • 1000 Series Firm Pocketed Coil
  • 1.5" Energy Foam
  • Coil Gauge: 14.75
  • BeautyEdge Foam Encased Edge
,ts_dimensions_height=15.5000

You like the cabin look, but you still need your modern conveniences. Because hanging out in your woodsy bed and watching TV is way more fun than roughing it in the outdoors.

name: Crown Mark Lawson 6 Piece Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Nightstand)
description: The Crown Mark Lawson Bedroom Set comes in a rich style and value combine with this six-piece bedroom set. It features hardwood construction, clean lines, spacious drawers, English dovetail joinery, nickel finish hardware, arched tops and slatted details. The warm brown finish complements any color palette. With a contemporary appeal with modern design, this Lawson Bedroom Collection is perfect for your bedroom décor. The panel bed features slatted designed headboard and footboard. The unique Drawer Dresser, matching Mirror and the Drawer Nightstand transforms this wonderful bed in to an even more fabulous bedroom group. The bed is constructed from 100% solid wood together with the case pieces and are available in warm brown finish. All drawers have knobs in a simple button styling in satin nickel finish, dovetail drawer construction and a full-extension ball-bearing drawer glides for years of trouble free use.

name: IFD Antique Bedroom Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Nightstand)
description: The IFD Antique Bedroom Set has that rustic, vintage look you love, coupled with amazingly solid artisan craftsmanship. Its six-step, hand-rubbed finish gives this platform bed frame a vintage look, with added protection from a clear lacquer coating. Features a soft, multi-color distressed finish on hand brushed wood. This set is built for lifetime service with its high quality, mortise and tenon joinery construction. Hand-forged iron moldings and hand-applied nail heads add industrial charm and character. Made from solid pine construction, soft multicolor distress finish, hand forged iron accents, and drawers for all your storage needs, the rustic look of the antique multicolor antique set captures a warm atmosphere sure to enhance any bedroom's décor.

name: Standard Garrison Panel 6 Piece Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Nightstand)
description: The Standard Garrison Bedroom Set is a collection of bedroom furniture, updates traditional design, integrating a contemporary smooth grey finish into classic elements such as turned legs, dentil and ogee molding, and beveled post overlays. For your dining room, choose from two tables, one with elegant legs and the other with an impressive trestle. The chairs are upholstered in a neutral color that pairs with the grey finish. For your bedroom, choose between a upholstered or a panel headboard. Resourceful storage pieces are available for both rooms as well, providing plenty of stylish and convenient options for storing clothes or dishes.

name: Kingsdown Prime Destan
description:
The Kingsdown Prime Collection delivers the latest comfort innovations at an exceptional value Each mattress in the collection provides the support that your body needs for deeper, more restful sleep. The Destan model is designed for firm support. Its unique triple-gauged zoned support unit features individually wrapped coils with targeted lumbar and perimeter support.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

name: Kingsdown Prime Merrivale
description:
The Kingsdown Prime Merrivale is delivers firm support. Its unique triple-gauged zoned support unit features individually wrapped coils with targeted lumbar and perimeter support. Comfort layers are topped with high performance micro-coils to deliver an unmistakable level of comfort that can only be found in a Kingsdown mattress.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

description:

The Kingsdown Prime Alvarado Eurotop delivers cushion-firm comfort from head to toe with targeted support in the lower back area, exactly where it’s needed most. Comfort layers and high-performance micro-coils lie atop a unique triple-gauged wrapped coil unit with zoned support and strong perimeter coils along all four sides of the mattress.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. name: Kingsdown Passions Tifton Hybrid Eurotop
description:
This Kingsdown Passions Tifton Hybrid mattress provides the ideal combination of heavy 15.5 gauge steel innerspring support with high performance comfort features. Individually wrapped coils work in three zones to give your body extraordinary support and pressure relief. Our posturized center support coupled with a latex lumbar zone will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs. Enjoy deeper, undisturbed sleep with built-in motion separation foam which mitigates partner disturbance, topped with comfort layers, including CoolActive memory foam, for the ultimate cushion-firm support experience.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • CoolActive Memory Foam: Gel-infused memory foam delivers superior conformance and breathability and helps keep your body’s temperature regulated throughout the night.
  • Plush & Firm Combination Fitness Foams: Gently cradle the body and deliver pressure point relief

  • 10 Year Warranty

 

,product_line=Passions,support_layers=
  • 1,030 (Q) Tri-Zoned Wrapped Coil Unit: This high coil count unit works in three unique zones. Each coil is individually wrapped to contour to the body and provide personalized support for both sleep partners. Our posturized center support provides firm lumbar support exactly the body needs it most, and the built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance. This unit also features reinforced edge support coils along both sides of the bed.
  • Latex BackEnforcer: Resilient lumbar support for the lower back
  • Ventilated Edge Support System: Our Full Body Surround® Edge Support system uses high-density foam on all sides to provide a 100% usable edge-to-edge sleeping surface with no “roll-out” feeling. Airflow channels increase air circulation for more comfortable sleep.

name: Kingsdown Passions Manorwood
description:
This Kingsdown Passions Manorwood is the cushion firm mattress you’ve been looking for. Individually wrapped 18-gauge steel coils work in three zones to give your body extraordinary support while our posturized center support will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs. Multiple comfort layers, including latex and CoolActive Memory Foam work together to deliver an undeniable feeling of comfort.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt: Cooling gel fibers on the surface of the mattress help dissipate heat to maintain an ideal body temperature for more comfortable sleep
  • Latex: Our luxurious latex delivers the ultimate in pressure relief and conformity. This resilient, pressure-relieving foam helps the body stay in one position longer, resulting in deeper sleep.
  • CoolActive Memory Foam: Gel-infused memory foam delivers superior conformance and breathability and helps keep your body’s temperature regulated throughout the night.
  • Firm Fitness Foam: Supportive, yet pressure relieving comfort
,comfort_level=Cushion Firm,core_construction=Tri-Zoned Individually Wrapped Coil Innerspring,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=

,features=

  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt

  • 10 Year Warranty
,product_line=Passions,support_layers=
  • 1,791 (Q) Tri-Zoned Wrapped Coil Unit: This high coil count unit works in three unique zones. Each coil is individually wrapped to contour to the body and provide personalized support for both sleep partners. Our posturized center support provides firm lumbar support exactly the body needs it most, and the built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance. Strong perimeter coils along all four sides of the bed deliver superior edge support.
  • Ventilated Edge Support System: Our Full Body Surround® Edge Support system uses high-density foam on all sides to provide a 100% usable edge-to-edge sleeping surface with no “roll-out” feeling. Airflow channels increase air circulation for more comfortable sleep.

name: Kingsdown Passions Glen Cove Hybrid Eurotop
description:
This Kingsdown Passions Glen Cove Hybrid is the perfect blend of supportive comfort. Resilient comfort layers work together to eliminate pressure points while the innerspring core offers unique support features. Individually wrapped coils work in three zones to give your body extraordinary support and pressure relief. Our posturized center support coupled with a latex lumbar zone will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs. The unit’s built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance for deeper, undisturbed sleep.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

name: Kingsdown Passions Irvingdale Eurotop
description:
Welcome to the luxurious Kingsdown Passions Irvingdale. From its beautiful quilted fabric through layer inside, the comfort of this model is undeniable. Individually wrapped 18-gauge steel coils work in three zones to give your body extraordinary support while our posturized center support will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs. Motion separation foam in the coil unit will mitigate partner disturbance while latex and Adaptive foams work to deliver unmatched comfort and pressure relief.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt: Cooling gel fibers on the surface of the mattress help dissipate heat to maintain an ideal body temperature for more comfortable sleep
  • Adaptive Foam: Although responsive and self-adjusting by nature, unlike memory foam, our Adaptive foam is not temperature sensitive. Independent air cells dissipate body heat and act as shock absorbers, reducing pressure points for more comfortable sleep.
  • Latex: Our luxurious latex delivers the ultimate in pressure relief and conformity. This resilient, pressure-relieving foam helps the body stay in one position longer, resulting in deeper sleep.
  • Dual Layer Plush Fitness Foams: For exceptional relief of pressure points

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown/Passions,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown/Passions
name: Kingsdown Passions Willoughby
description:
The Kingsdown Passions Willoughby is in a class of its own. Its beautiful aesthetics are only a hint of the luxury inside. Thick, luxurious latex, coupled with high performance micro-coils deliver an unmistakable level of comfort that can only be found in a Kingsdown product. The support unit is comprised of individually wrapped 18-gauge steel coils that work in three zones for support from head to toe. Our posturized center support will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs, and you can enjoy deeper, undisturbed sleep with our built-in motion separation foam designed to mitigate partner disturbance.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt: Cooling gel fibers on the surface of the mattress help dissipate heat to maintain an ideal body temperature for more comfortable sleep
  • Latex: Our luxurious latex delivers the ultimate in pressure relief and conformity. This resilient, pressure-relieving foam helps the body stay in one position longer, resulting in deeper sleep.
  • Over 1,000 (Q) High Performance Micro-Coils: specially crafted to deliver durability and unsurpassed contouring comfort
  • CoolActive Memory Foam: Gel-infused memory foam delivers superior conformance and breathability and helps keep your body’s temperature regulated throughout the night.
  • Firm Fitness Foam: Supportive, yet pressure relieving comfort
,comfort_level=Plush,core_construction=Tri-Zoned Individually Wrapped Coil Innerspring,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Twin - 38" W x 75" L x 15" H
  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 15" H
  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 15" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 15" H
,features=
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt
  • Luxurious Latex Comfort Layer
  • Over 1,000 (Q) High Performance Micro-Coils
  • CoolActive Memory Foam
  • Firm Fitness Foam
  • 1,791 (Q) Individually Wrapped Coils with Posturized Center Support and strong perimeter support coils
  • Motion Separation Foam
  • Full Body Surround® ventilated foam edge support system 
  • Adjustable Base friendly 
  • Handcrafted in the USA
  • Sleep to Live Institute Certifiedo 100% of our mattresses are tested to master standards for proper postural support and pressure relief 
  • CertiPUR-US® Certified Foamo Meets CertiPUR-US® rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories o Low VOC emissions for indoor air qualityo Made without formaldehyde and ozone depleters o Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
  • 10 Year Warranty
,product_line=Passions,support_layers=
  • 1,791 (Q) Tri-Zoned Wrapped Coil Unit: This high coil count unit works in three unique zones. Each coil is individually wrapped to contour to the body and provide personalized support for both sleep partners. Our posturized center support provides firm lumbar support exactly the body needs it most, and the built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance. Strong perimeter coils along all four sides of the bed deliver superior edge support.
  • Ventilated Edge Support System: Our Full Body Surround® Edge Support system uses high-density foam on all sides to provide a 100% usable edge-to-edge sleeping surface with no “roll-out” feeling. Airflow channels increase air circulation for more comfortable sleep.

name: Kingsdown Passions Chandlerville Eurotop
description:
The Kingsdown Passions Chanderville is the ultimate in ultra plush, luxurious comfort. Specialty foams and high performance micro-coils work together to deliver undeniable, enveloping comfort. The support unit is comprised of individually wrapped 18-gauge steel coils that work in three zones for support from head to toe. Our posturized center support will deliver the targeted support your lower back needs, and you can enjoy deeper, undisturbed sleep with our built-in motion separation foam designed to mitigate partner disturbance.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Fresh Comfort® Quilt: Cooling gel fibers on the surface of the mattress help dissipate heat to maintain an ideal body temperature for more comfortable sleep
  • Latex: Our luxurious latex delivers the ultimate in pressure relief and conformity. This resilient, pressure-relieving foam helps the body stay in one position longer, resulting in deeper sleep.
  • Adaptive Foam: Although responsive and self-adjusting by nature, unlike memory foam, our Adaptive foam is not temperature sensitive. Independent air cells dissipate body heat and act as shock absorbers, reducing pressure points for more comfortable sleep.
  • Over 1,000 (Q) High Performance Micro-Coils: specially crafted to deliver durability and unsurpassed contouring comfort
  • Dual Layer Plush Fitness Foams: For exceptional relief of pressure points

name: Kingsdown Vintage Brenneman Firm
description:
An elegant blend of nature and luxury. The Kingsdown Vintage Collection® is masterfully designed using generations of craftsmanship mastery for exceptional sleep. The Brenneman features an impressive combination of natural materials coupled with the latest innovations in sleep technology to deliver deep restorative sleep. Zoned, individually wrapped, 18-gauge innerspring coils provide indulgent support and sumptuous comfort, while natural cushioning layers and a ventilated edge support system regulate temperature throughout the night. Finished with an elegant hand-tufted damask cover woven with wool and quilted with cooling gel fibers, this sleep system exudes unparalleled attention to detail. From its design to construction, the Vintage Collection® is a testament to timeless quality and artistry.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

Strong perimeter coils along all four sides of the bed deliver superior edge support.
  • Ventilated Edge Support System: Our Full Body Surround® Edge Support system uses high-density foam on all sides to provide a 100% usable edge-to-edge sleeping surface with no “roll-out” feeling. Airflow channels increase air circulation for more comfortable sleep.

name: Kingsdown Vintage Cypress Bay
description:
An elegant blend of nature and luxury. The Kingsdown Vintage Collection® is masterfully designed using generations of craftsmanship mastery for exceptional sleep. Cypress Bay features layers of luxurious latex, 100% pure cotton, and Joma wool for deep-down comfort. Zoned, individually wrapped, 18-gauge innerspring coils provide indulgent support and sumptuous comfort, while the ventilated edge support system regulates temperature throughout the night. Finished with an elegant hand-tufted damask cover woven with wool and quilted with cooling gel fibers, this sleep system exudes unparalleled attention to detail. From its design to construction, the Vintage Collection® is a testament to timeless quality and artistry.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

name: Kingsdown Vintage Hanford Hills Eurotop
description:
An elegant blend of nature and luxury. The Kingsdown Vintage Collection® is masterfully designed using generations of craftsmanship mastery for exceptional sleep. Hanford Hills features thick layers of soft, breathable cotton, wool and genuine horsehair that work to inherently wick away moisture and regulate body temperature. Resilient latex and individually wrapped coils enhance pressure relief and body contouring support. Our 18-gauge tri-zoned coil unit provides indulgent support and sumptuous comfort, while the ventilated edge support system regulates temperature throughout the night. Finished with an elegant hand-tufted damask cover woven with wool and quilted with cooling gel fibers, this sleep system exudes unparalleled attention to detail. From its design to construction, the Vintage Collection® is a testament to timeless quality and artistry.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown/Vintage,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown/Vintage
name: Kingsdown Vintage Van Allen Eurotop
description:
Introducing the Kingsdown Van Allen, the epitome of natural luxury in the Vintage Collection®. Masterfully designed using thick layers of 100% pure cotton, latex and exotic natural materials such as Alpaca Wool, genuine horsehair, and Joma wool, this model offers sumptuous comfort unlike any other. 18-gauge individually wrapped coils work in three zones to give your body extraordinary support and pressure relief while built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance for deeper, undisturbed sleep. Additional features include high performance micro-coils to contour to the body and ventilated edge support to regulate temperature throughout the night. Finished with an elegant hand-tufted damask cover woven with wool and quilted with cooling gel fibers, this sleep system exudes unparalleled attention to detail. From its design to construction, the Vintage Collection® is a testament to timeless quality and artistry.

About Kingsdown: HANDCRAFTED EXCELLENCE SINCE 1904. For over a century, the Kingsdown name has been synonymous with unprecedented quality. We are the only mattress company that tests every single mattress we make to ensure consistent quality and accurate support. When you sleep on a Kingsdown, you'll feel the difference a smart mattress makes on your quality of sleep, and more importantly, on your quality of life.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Elegant hand-tufted damask cover with cooling fibers: woven with Joma wool for a cool and ultra-luxurious sleep experience. Gel fibers in this resilient cushioning layer add pressure-relieving comfort, dissipating heat and providing cooling benefits.
  • Alpaca Wool: helps control body temperature and is remarkably comfortable
  • Joma Wool Comfort layer: Enhances durability and natural temperature regulation as you sleep.
  • Latex: Our luxurious latex delivers the ultimate in pressure relief and conformity. This resilient, pressure-relieving foam helps the body stay in one position longer, resulting in deeper sleep.
  • 100% Pure Cotton: Creates a comfortable and healthy sleep environment from one of nature’s most breathable materials
  • Genuine Horsehair: Channels away moisture to let fresh air in and out while offering resilient support to the body
  • Over 1,000 (Q) High Performance Micro-Coils: specially crafted to deliver durability and unsurpassed contouring comfort
  • Plush Fitness Foam: For exceptional relief of pressure points
,comfort_level=Plush,core_construction=Tri-Zoned Individually Wrapped Coil Innerspring,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=

  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 16.5" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 16.5" H
,features=
  • Elegant hand-tufted damask cover with Joma wool and cooling fibers
  • Elegant hand-tufted damask cover with Joma wool and cooling fibers
  • Precisely layered natural materials 
  • Alpaca Wool
  • Joma Wool comfort layer
  • Luxurious Latex
  • 100% Pure Cotton
  • Genuine Horsehair
  • High Performance Micro-Coils
  • Plush Fitness Foam
  • 2,000 (Q) Individually Wrapped Coils with Posturized Center Support and strong perimeter support coils
  • Motion Separation Foam
  • Full Body Surround® ventilated foam edge support system 
  • Adjustable Base friendly
  • Handcrafted in the USA
  • Sleep to Live Institute Certifiedo 100% of our mattresses are tested to master standards for proper postural support and pressure relief
  • CertiPUR-US® Certified Foamo Meets CertiPUR-US® rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories o Low VOC emissions for indoor air qualityo Made without formaldehyde and ozone depleters o Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
  • 10 Year Warranty
,product_line=Vintage,support_layers=
  • 2,000 (Q) Tri-Zoned Wrapped Coil Unit: This high coil count unit works in three unique zones. Each coil is individually wrapped to contour to the body and provide personalized support for both sleep partners. Our posturized center support provides firm lumbar support exactly the body needs it most, and the built-in motion separation foam mitigates partner disturbance. Strong perimeter coils along all four sides of the bed deliver superior edge support.
  • Ventilated Edge Support System: Our Full Body Surround® Edge Support system uses high-density foam on all sides to provide a 100% usable edge-to-edge sleeping surface with no “roll-out” feeling. Airflow channels increase air circulation for more comfortable sleep.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown/ZedBed,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown/ZedBed
name: Kingsdown Zedbed Adjust Copper
description:
The Zedbed Adjust Collection features VX Copper Infused Memory Foam, a new material that combines the relaxing comfort of memory foam with the support of high-density foam. This proprietary foam is only manufactured in our company-owned production facilities, allowing us to have total quality control and unique foam formulations.

Due to our expertise in foam development, we have developed a mattress series that provides a sensation of relaxation with a variety of comfort feels. This unique foam does not react to body heat or ambient air; the comfort of the mattress remains constant all night in any season. When combined with our perforation techniques, the thousands of cells let air flow freely while keeping the body at an ideal temperature for a restful sleep. Copper is infused to offer an even cooler, cleaner and healthier sleeping environment. In addition, our Secure Stitch process eliminates fabric shifting, enhances durability and resists body impressions.

The Adjust Copper model features a firm support level.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Designed for Comfort: VX is a unique foam that combines the relaxing comfort of memory foam with the support of high-density foam. It does not react to body heat or ambient air; the comfort remains constant all night in any season. When combined with our perforation techniques, the thousands of cells let air flow freely while keeping the body at an ideal temperature for a restful sleep.
  • Copper is known for benefits such as maintaining a cool, comfortable sleeping environment, it is dust mite resistant and encourages brain regeneration during sleep. We have paired the benefits of copper to our proprietary VX foam.
  • Improved Air Circulation. With Expulse-Air technology, we have reinvented the way air circulates in a mattress. The ventilation channels positioned across the entire width of the core layer of the mattress allows air to move freely and escape easily through the sides. The warm air produced by your body finds a simple way to escape from the mattress, which leaves you feeling more refreshed.
,comfort_level=Firm,core_construction=Breathable foam core,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=

  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 9.75" H
  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 9.75" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 9.75" H
,features=
  • Secure Stitch: artfully stitched with handcrafted panels
  • Secure Stitch: artfully stitched with handcrafted panels
  • Copper Infused VX Foam
  • Expulse-Air Technology
  • Zedbed Exclusive Perfor-Pro
  • Micro-Coils
  • Adjustable Base friendly 
  • Handcrafted in Canada
  • CertiPUR-US® Certified Foamo Meets CertiPUR-US® rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories o Low VOC emissions for indoor air qualityo Made without formaldehyde and ozone depleters o Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
  • 10 year Warranty 
,product_line=Zedbed,support_layers=
  • Designed for Support: The foam core has been developed by our sleep engineers to maximize the benefits of a mattress paired with an adjustable bed.
  • Our wave design is created with horizontal channels to increase the flexibility of the foam core in order to work in synchronicity with the movements of the adjustable bed. It also has the added benefits of air flow.
  • Micro coils are added to the center for a more precise focus on the lumbar region and are individually wrapped for maximum motion isolation.
,ts_dimensions_height=9.7500

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Default Category/Mattresses/Kingsdown/ZedBed,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Kingsdown/ZedBed
name: Kingsdown Zedbed Adjust Copper Ultra
description:
The Zedbed Adjust Collection features VX Copper Infused Memory Foam, a new material that combines the relaxing comfort of memory foam with the support of high-density foam. This proprietary foam is only manufactured in our company-owned production facilities, allowing us to have total quality control and unique foam formulations.

Due to our expertise in foam development, we have developed a mattress series that provides a sensation of relaxation with a variety of comfort feels. This unique foam does not react to body heat or ambient air; the comfort of the mattress remains constant all night in any season. When combined with our perforation techniques, the thousands of cells let air flow freely while keeping the body at an ideal temperature for a restful sleep. Copper is infused to offer an even cooler, cleaner and healthier sleeping environment. In addition, our Secure Stitch process eliminates fabric shifting, enhances durability and resists body impressions.

The Adjust Copper Ultra model features a medium support level.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,brand=Kingsdown,closeout=No,comfort_layers=
  • Designed for Comfort: VX is a unique foam that combines the relaxing comfort of memory foam with the support of high-density foam. It does not react to body heat or ambient air; the comfort remains constant all night in any season. When combined with our perforation techniques, the thousands of cells let air flow freely while keeping the body at an ideal temperature for a restful sleep.
  • Copper is known for benefits such as maintaining a cool, comfortable sleeping environment, it is dust mite resistant and encourages brain regeneration during sleep. We have paired the benefits of copper to our proprietary VX foam.
  • Improved Air Circulation. With Expulse-Air technology, we have reinvented the way air circulates in a mattress. The ventilation channels positioned across the entire width of the core layer of the mattress allows air to move freely and escape easily through the sides. The warm air produced by your body finds a simple way to escape from the mattress, which leaves you feeling more refreshed.
  • Adaptive Foam: Although responsive and self-adjusting by nature, unlike memory foam, our Adaptive foam is not temperature sensitive. Independent air cells dissipate body heat and act as shock absorbers, reducing pressure points for more comfortable sleep.
,comfort_level=Medium,core_construction=Breathable foam core,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Twin - 38" W x 75" L x 10.75" H
  • Full - 53" W x 75" L x 10.75" H
  • Queen - 60" W x 80" L x 10.75" H
  • King - 76" W x 80" L x 10.75" H
,features=
  • Secure Stitch: artfully stitched with handcrafted panels
  • Secure Stitch: artfully stitched with handcrafted panels 
  • Copper Infused VX Foam
  • Adaptive Foam
  • Expulse-Air Technology
  • Zedbed Exclusive Perfor-Pro
  • Micro-Coils 
  • Adjustable Base friendly 
  • Handcrafted in Canada
  • CertiPUR-US® Certified Foamo Meets CertiPUR-US® rigorous standards for content, emissions and durability, and analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories o Low VOC emissions for indoor air qualityo Made without formaldehyde and ozone depleters o Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
  • 10 year Warranty 
,product_line=Zedbed,support_layers=
  • Designed for Support: The foam core has been developed by our sleep engineers to maximize the benefits of a mattress paired with an adjustable bed.
  • Our wave design is created with horizontal channels to increase the flexibility of the foam core in order to work in synchronicity with the movements of the adjustable bed. It also has the added benefits of air flow.
  • Micro coils are added to the center for a more precise focus on the lumbar region and are individually wrapped for maximum motion isolation.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elkins II Plush
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elkins II Plush mattress features a softer feel than its firm counterpoint. It has better pressure point relief than ever before, a custom coil system for contouring support and a layer of cooling gel foam. Together, this means a cradling, heat-dissipating, motion-reducing sleep experience that helps you maintain a balanced sleep temperature throughout the night.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elkins II Plush Eurotop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elkins II Plush Eurotop provides support and comfort through the comfort support system and eurotop. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering full support. Encased with high density foam for extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium cover provide pressure point relief. Cool Twist™ Gel Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Select Kleinmon II Firm
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Kleinmon II Firm Mattress is what you are looking for if you need a very firm bed. It supports you with a Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium cover provide pressure point relief. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Select,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Select
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Select Kleinmon II Plush
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Kleinmon II Plush Mattress is what you are looking for if you prefer a softer mattress with a medium feel. It supports you with a Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium cover provide pressure point relief. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Select,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Select
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Select Kleinmon II Firm Pillowtop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Select Kleinmon II Firm Pillow Top mattress is the latest model of one of Serta’s best-selling mattresses. It features a new comfort system for better pressure point relief, along with a new individualized coil system for exceptional support all the way to the edge of the mattress. A layer of cooling gel memory foam creates a cool and comfortable ‘this mattress was made just for me’ type of experience. The pillowtop provides additional comfort on a firm mattress for those that need the support of a firm mattress yet want the softness of a plush mattress.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Select,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Select
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Select Kleinmon II Plush Pillowtop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Kleinmon II Plush Pillowtop Mattress is what you are looking for if you prefer a softer mattress with a medium feel and enjoy the luxury of a pillowtop. It supports you with a Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium cover provide pressure point relief. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Extra Firm
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Extra Firm Mattress is a very firm mattress. It offers custom support with the 1,000 Edition Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium fabric provide pressure point relief. Additional heat-regulating fabric helps keep you cooler. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Elite,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Elite
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Plush
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Plush Mattress is a plush mattress. It offers custom support with the 1,000 Edition Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium fabric provide pressure point relief. Additional heat-regulating fabric helps keep you cooler. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly. The Plush offers higher gauge coils to provide a more gentle and flexible sleeping experience compared to the other Trelleburg firm mattresses.
meta_title: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Plush

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Firm Pillowtop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Firm Pillowtop Mattress is a firm mattress with a soft top layer. It offers custom support with the 1,000 Edition Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils are thick to contour your body while offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium fabric provide pressure point relief. Additional heat-regulating fabric helps keep you cooler. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

categories: Default Category/Mattresses,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta,Default Category/Mattresses/Serta/Perfect Sleeper Elite,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta ,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Serta /Perfect Sleeper Elite
name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Plush Pillowtop
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Trelleburg II Plush Pillowtop Mattress is a plush mattress with an added layer of comfort in the pillowtop. It offers custom support with the 1,000 Edition Custom Support Coil System. These Individually Wrapped Coils contour to your body offering excellent support. Two rows of denser coils on both side of the mattress provide extended mattress surface use and a firm sitting edge. Specialized Foam, Engineered Fibers and a super stretch premium fabric provide pressure point relief. Additional heat-regulating fabric helps keep you cooler. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly. The Plush offers higher gauge coils to provide a more gentle and flexible sleeping experience compared to the other Trelleburg firm mattresses.

These Individually Wrapped Coils which are smaller gauge contour to your body offering excellent support. Cool Twist™ Gel Memory Foam adds support as it disperses heat letting you sleep calmly and coolly.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Foam Carriage Hill II
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Foam Carriage Hill Plush II mattresses are all foam, built for support and long lasting comfort. Supported with a firm foam core with high density foam encasement to provide a firm mattress edge. EverCool Fuze Gel Memory Foam promotes cooling by increasing airflow and dissipating heat. Cool Twist® Gel Memory Foam gives you contouring support and helps you sleep cooler. This is a medium foam mattress that is a bit on the firmer side. A very good all around Gel Memory Foam mattress.

name: Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Foam Southpoint II
description: The Serta Perfect Sleeper Elite Foam Southpoint II Plush mattresses are all foam, built for support and long lasting comfort. Supported with a firm foam core with high density foam encasement to provide a firm mattress edge. Increased thickness of EverCool Fuze Gel Memory Foam promotes cooling by increasing airflow and dissipating heat. Thicker Cool Twist® Gel Memory Foam gives you contouring support and helps you sleep cooler. This is a medium foam mattress that is more on the plush side. A very good all around Gel Memory Foam mattress.

name: Serta SleepTrue Alverson II Firm Eurotop
description: Serta's SleepTrue Collection of beds gives you a value priced mattress using Serta technology to bring you an affordable, Quality Mattress. The Serta SleepTrue Alverson II Firm Euro Top Mattress is a Pocketed Coil mattress built for lasting comfort. With a supportive, contouring Wrapped Coil unit and Cool Twist® Gel Memory Foam to help dissipate heat as it conforms, helping you sleep comfortably. A good mattress for a back sleeper.

categories: Default Category/Adjustable Beds,Default Category/Sleep Accessories,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Sleep Tracking Systems,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Sleep Tracking Systems
name: Beautyrest Sleep Tracker Smart Bed System
description:
Make Your Bed A Smart Bed™ - Monitor your sleep. Understand your sleep. Fix your sleep. Sleeptracker® technology is a non-wearable tracker that accurately monitors your sleep, respiration, heart rate, and more! It can be used with any mattress, foundation, frame or base.
• Powered by AI, the Beautyrest Sleeptracker is the premier and only sleep monitoring device that is Amazon Alexa enabled to integrate into your smart home
• Make your bed a smart bed: the only non-wearable solution that works with your bed regardless of the type of mattress, boxspring or bedding
• Highly accurate sensors: analyze and monitor respiration and heart rates, and unique sleep behaviors such as body movement and wakefulness
• Intuitive app: captures precise readings and translates into personalized sleep data; sleep cycle alarm detects the optimal wake time for you
• Powerful processor: continuously learns your sleep patterns and rhythms, and delivers the most up-to-date information for effective sleep coaching
• Individualized sleep coaching: the only solution in its class to monitor two sleepers independently and separate their sleep data for individualized reporting and coaching tips
meta_title: Beautyrest Sleep Tracker Smart Bed System
meta_keywords: Beautyrest Sleep Tracker Smart Bed System
meta_description: Beautyrest Sleep Tracker Smart Bed System

name: Sandberg Furniture Sunset Boulevard Queen Bed

categories: Default Category/Sleep Accessories,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Toppers,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Mattress Toppers
name: Malouf Isolus Latex Foam Mattress Topper
description: The Malouf Latex Foam Mattress Topper with 2 inches of natural latex, this mattress topper provides an easy upgrade to any existing mattress. The resilient latex topper, responds quickly to body weight and position, bouncing back to provide superior relief from sleeping pains. It is ventilated to increase air flow and regulate sleeping temperature. This ISOLUS® Latex topper core is made in the USA with thorough quality control systems in place. Each topper is made with no fillers, no glue seams and no laminations. The pure material is produced with a consistent latex foam that is poured, vulcanized to remove impurities and then washed and dried to finalize the latex curing process. The end result is a soft, comfortable foam mattress topper that does not wear and break down like other foam sleep products do. This allows you to have a consistent sleep experience over the entire life of your mattress topper. The surrounding the latex foam is a super-soft, removable rayon from bamboo cover. The breathable material of the cover complements the topper's ventilation qualities for a cooler sleeping temperature.
meta_title: Malouf Isolus Latex Foam Mattress Topper
meta_keywords: Malouf Isolus Latex Foam Mattress Topper
meta_description: Malouf Isolus Latex Foam Mattress Topper

name: Crown Mark Lawson White 6 Piece Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Nightstand)
description: The Crown Mark Lawson White Bedroom Set comes in a rich style and value combine with this six-piece bedroom set. It features hardwood construction, clean lines, spacious drawers, English dovetail joinery, nickel finish hardware, arched tops and slatted details. The crisp, white finish complements any color palette. With a contemporary appeal with modern design, this Lawson Bedroom Collection is perfect for your bedroom décor. The panel bed features slatted designed headboard and footboard. The unique dresser, matching mirror and the nightstand transforms this wonderful bed in to an even more fabulous bedroom group. The bed is constructed from 100% solid wood together with the case pieces. All drawers have knobs in a simple button styling in satin nickel finish, dovetail drawer construction and a full-extension ball-bearing drawer glides for years of trouble free use.

name: New Classic Bayfront Panel 6 Piece Set (Headboard, Footboard, Rails, Dresser, Mirror, and Nightstand)
description:
The New Classic Bayfront with Panel bed is the perfect collection for your young child or preteen, the Bayfront youth collection provides stylish and durable pieces to grow with your child; and their changing tastes! Featuring full size beds for your teen, the Bayfront collection provides something for every age, along with coordinating storage pieces that are elegant enough for an adult room! Large drawers provide ample room for everything from toys to clothes, while slat and panel details on beds add a handcrafted look to the collection. Finished in a clean, crisp white finish, the Bayfront collection brightens any decor. Bring the Bayfront collection into your home today for quality pieces that both you and your child can enjoy!
Some of the features that distinguish the Bayfront Collection by New Classic Furniture are:
Poplar Solids and Basswood Veneers
European Side Mounted Drawers Glides
White Painted Finish
White Wood with Bronze Finish Metal Insert Hardware

description:
The New Classic Megan bedroom set has a whimsical heart motif, sweetly turned legs gently sloped crowns, beaded drawer inset molding and soft pink crystal acrylic drawer pulls make the Megan Collection a person's dream bedroom.

• Carved Detailing
The vivid carved detailing adds a classical touch that tells stories while adding a distinguished look and feel.
• Molding Detail
No home’s design is complete without the finishing touch of seamlessly fitting molding detail.
• Turned Legs
Enjoy the almost serpentine-like coil design of these turned legs. The craftsmanship and detailing on them is unmatched
• Hardwood Solids and Veneers
• Solid Casegood Bottoms

name: Donco Antique Grey Louver Low Loft Bed with 3 Drawer Chest, 2 Drawer Chest/Shelves, and Bookcase
description:
This beautiful Donco Antique Grey Louver Twin Low Loft Bed Set A includes Low Loft Bed, 3-Drawer Chest, 2-Drawer Chest with Shelves, Bookcase. The set brings lots of imaginative play and fun to your child's room and features 100% solid wood construction along with steel hardware connections for excellent strength, stability and durability. The Antique Grey finish will make a great addition to any room. Complete with ladder, guardrails, and slat mattress supports. See below for more item features.
Product Features
• Solid, sturdy 100% wood construction.
• Antique Grey finish.
• Steel hardware connections for unsurpassed strength and stability.
• Ladder may be placed at either side.
• Complete mattress slat supports included

name: Donco Brushed Driftwood Twin Club House Tall Loft Bed
description:
The Donco Club House Low Loft Twin Bed in Brushed Driftwood will excite any child to have their very own hideaway in their bedroom with the Club House Low Loft Bed with Caster Bed. It has a gray finish and features ladder steps on each side, a window cutout, and space underneath for playtime. The Club House low loft bed has many features including a twin-size upper sleeping area while the space-saving ladder design makes it easy to get in and out of bed. Optional matching full size lower bed on casters.
• Twin size loft bed.
• Solid, sturdy 100% wood construction.
• Beautiful Brushed Driftwood finish.
• Steel hardware connections for unsurpassed strength and stability.
• Includes complete slat mattress supports.
• Optional matching full size lower bed on casters.

name: Donco White Mission Bunkbed
description:
Give your room a fun coastal feel with the Donco White Mission Style Twin over Twin Bunk Bed. The mission style design, with its vertical wooden construction is designed for strength and good looks.
These white bunk beds have a classic, shabby chic look, that is soft enough for a young child's room, but elegant and sophisticated enough for older occupants.
• Our white bunk beds, twin over twin, are classic pieces that can bring a sense of subtle style into a children's bedroom setting.
• At the same time the sophistication of the craftsmanship, and the lilting grace of the design, makes these appropriate beds for guest rooms, cabins, dorm rooms, and a variety of locations where you need multiple bedding options.
• These are also very safe and secure pieces, and our white bunk beds twin over twin are manufactured to exceed all ASTM standards, with metal on metal connectors, rounded edges, and super safe drawers with European gliders and stoppers to prevent accidents.
• Includes: 1 Twin over Twin/Full Mission Bunk Bed.
• 3 Drawer Underbed Storage is available
• Underbed Storage(0292-W) - optional accessory

name: Donco Twin over Full Mission Bunkbed
description:
Give your room a fun coastal feel with the Donco Cappuccino Mission Style Twin over Full Bunk Bed. The mission style design, with its vertical wooden construction is designed for strength and good looks.
These cappuccino bunk beds have a classic, shabby chic look, that is soft enough for a young child's room, but elegant and sophisticated enough for older occupants. which provides a clean clear canvas that will take and hold the cappuccino paint application with discoloration than solid wood materials alone.
• Our cappuccino bunk beds, twin over full, are classic pieces that can bring a sense of subtle style into a children's bedroom setting.
• At the same time the sophistication of the craftsmanship, and the lilting grace of the design, makes these appropriate beds for guest rooms, cabins, dorm rooms, and a variety of locations where you need multiple bedding options.

• Includes: 1 Twin over Full Mission Bunk Bed.
• 2 Drawer Underbed Storage and Twin Trundle are available
• Underbed Storage(505-CP) - optional accessory
• Twin Trundle(503-CP) - optional accessory

name: Donco Light Grey Twin over Twin Deer Blind Bunkbed
description:
Give your room a fun coastal feel with the Donco Light Grey Deer blind Style Twin over Twin Bunk Bed. More than a run-of-the-mill bunk bed, this set carves out two separate spaces, perfect shared bedrooms. Young children sleep soundly on the lower bunk, flush with the ground, while the upper bunk, shaped like a traditional deer blind, stimulates the imagination as your child grows. The light grey finished bunk loft bed is made from sturdy Brazilian pine wood and resembles a mini house. Guard rails are included on the top bunk for safety. This piece is strong enough to last for years to come and will surely be a treasured favorite of the whole family. which provides a clean clear canvas that will take and hold the light grey paint application with less yellowing and discoloration than solid wood materials alone.
• Our light grey bunk beds, twin over twin, are classic pieces that can bring a sense of subtle style into a children's bedroom setting.
• At the same time the sophistication of the craftsmanship, and the lilting grace of the design, makes these appropriate beds for guest rooms, cabins, dorm rooms, and a variety of locations where you need multiple bedding options.
• These are also very safe and secure pieces, and our light grey bunk beds twin over twin are manufactured to exceed all ASTM standards, with metal on metal connectors, rounded edges, and super safe drawers with European gliders and stoppers to prevent accidents.
• Includes: 1 Twin over Twin Deer Blind Bunk Bed.
• 2 headboards, 2 footboards, frame, ladder and side bars
• Made of Brazilian pine wood
• Optional Green Camo Curtains (_1370-DGC)
• Optional Blue Curtains (_1370-DB)
• Optional Pink Curtains (_1370-DP)

name: Donco Slate Grey Princeton Stairway Bunkbed
description:
Give your room a fun new age feel with the Donco Slate Grey Princeton Style Twin over Twin Bunk Bed with Stairway. This grey is not boring. It has a slight gun metal hue to it with shades of black giving it dimension. Great option for both girls and boys rooms. The stair step design has built in safety in mind. Instead of going up small ladder rungs, your child can safely enter and exit the bed on actual steps. The top of the stair steps feature a 3-way railing your child can brace themselves on as they are climbing in. Built into the steps are 4 drawers great for toys and clothes so no wasted space here
• These are also very safe and secure pieces, and our slate grey bunk beds twin over twin are manufactured to exceed all ASTM standards, with metal on metal connectors, rounded edges, and super safe drawers with European gliders and stoppers to prevent accidents.
• Includes: 1 Twin over Twin Princeton Bunk Bed with Stairway.
• 2 Drawer Underbed Storage and Twin Trundle are available
• Underbed Storage(505-SG) - optional accessory
• Twin Trundle(503-SG) - optional accessory

name: Donco Cappuccino Contempo Bed
description:
The Donco Cappuccino Full Contemporary bed is great for your kid's bedroom. Finished in a cappuccino color, the bed matches easily any home decor. Comes with slat kits for a mattress ready design.
• Our cappuccino bunk beds, are classic pieces that can bring a sense of subtle style into a children's bedroom setting.
• At the same time the sophistication of the craftsmanship, and the lilting grace of the design, makes these appropriate beds for guest rooms, cabins, dorm rooms, and a variety of locations where you need multiple bedding options.
• These are also very safe and secure pieces, and our cappuccino beds are manufactured to exceed all ASTM standards, with metal on metal connectors, rounded edges, and super safe drawers with European gliders and stoppers to prevent accidents.
• Includes: 1 Full Contempo Bunk Bed.
• 2 Drawer Underbed Storage and Twin Trundle are available
• Underbed Storage(505-CP) - optional accessory
• Twin Trundle(503-CP) - optional accessory

name: Donco Twin Low Loft Bed with Desk, Chest, and Bookcase
description:
The Donco Low Loft Twin Bed is a great addition to any room. This study loft features a twin bed, built in ladder, 3 drawers, casters, 2 open shelves and simple pulls. This loft is finished in dark cappuccino.
• Casters - Keep your interior design options open! Now you can re-arrange your furniture with ease, thanks to an installed set of casters.
• Simple Pulls - Allow other design features on your furniture piece or overall decor to have center stage with the classic clean look of simple pulls.
• Dark cappuccino finish
• Pine finish
• 3 drawers
• 2 open shelves
• Roll out desk
• Built in ladder
• Twin loft bed

name: Donco Antique Grey Louver Twin Low Loft Bed with 3 Drawer Chest, 2 Drawer Chest/Shelves, and Bookcase
description:
This beautiful Donco Antique Grey Louver Twin Low Loft Bed brings lots of imaginative play and fun to your child's room and features 100% solid wood construction along with steel hardware connections for excellent strength, stability and durability. The Antique Grey finish will make a great addition to any room. Complete with ladder, guardrails, and slat mattress supports. See below for more item features.
Product Features
• Solid, sturdy 100% wood construction.
• Antique Grey finish.
• Steel hardware connections for unsurpassed strength and stability.
• Ladder may be placed at either side.
• Complete mattress slat supports included

name: Donco White Twin over Twin/Twin over Full Mission Stairway Bunkbed
description:
Give your room a fun coastal feel with the Donco White Mission Style Twin over Twin Bunk Bed with Stairway. The mission style design, with its vertical wooden construction is designed for strength and good looks.
These white bunk beds have a classic, shabby chic look, that is soft enough for a young child's room, but elegant and sophisticated enough for older occupants.
• Our white bunk beds, twin over twin, are classic pieces that can bring a sense of subtle style into a children's bedroom setting.
• At the same time the sophistication of the craftsmanship, and the lilting grace of the design, makes these appropriate beds for guest rooms, cabins, dorm rooms, and a variety of locations where you need multiple bedding options.
• These are also very safe and secure pieces, and our white bunk beds twin over twin are manufactured to exceed all ASTM standards, with metal on metal connectors, rounded edges, and super safe drawers with European gliders and stoppers to prevent accidents.
• Includes: 1 Twin over Twin Mission Bunk Bed.
• 2 Drawer Underbed Storage and Twin Trundle are available
• Underbed Storage(505-W) - optional accessory
• Twin Trundle(503-W) - optional accessory

name: Donco Lavender, Pink and Lime Twin Doll House Stair Step Loft
description: What little girl wouldn't want to sleep in her very own doll house? The charming and colorful Donco Lavender, Pink, and Lime Twin Doll House Stairway Loft Bed features a loft bunk bed designed to look as if it came straight out of a fairy tale story. With its light purple, soft pink and green color tones, this bed creates the whimsical and fun playtime and bedtime your child is dreaming of! The Doll House loft bed has many features including a twin-size upper sleeping area while the super safe step-style entry makes it easy for your little ones to get in and out of bed and features a built-in 4 drawer chest on the side. A built-in magazine rack on the backside of the stairs is the perfect place to put her favorite books. An optional lower bed frame can be added to create the lower sleep area. The Doll House Loft Bed is as sturdy as it is beautiful. Quality construction and beautiful details make this a wonderful centerpiece for your child's bedroom and the perfect choice for your imaginative little girl. Twin or Full bed will fit under the loft (purchased separately).

name: New Classic Megan Dresser Mirror Set
description:
The New Classic Megan Dresser with mirror with 9 drawers has a whimsical heart motif, sweetly turned legs gently sloped crowns, beaded drawer inset molding and soft pink crystal acrylic drawer pulls.
• Turned Posts
Add a touch of elegance with the decorative look of the beautifully turned posts on this dresser and mirror.
• Carved Detailing
The vivid carved detailing adds a classical touch that tells stories while adding a distinguished look and feel.
• Molding Detail
No home’s design is complete without the finishing touch of seamlessly fitting molding detail.
• Turned Legs
Enjoy the almost serpentine-like coil design of these turned legs. The craftsmanship and detailing on them is unmatched
• Hardwood Solids and Veneers
• Solid Case good Bottoms
• Turned Legs
• Beveled edges on the mirror

The designs are transitional with rope and pearl features to set them apart from other designs on the market.
