categories: Default Category/Massage Chairs,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating/Massage Chairs
name: Cozzia Qi Se 710 Black Massage Chair
description:
Cozzia Qi Se 710 Black Massage Chair is the most popular model massage chair offered by Cozzia. The Cozzia Qi SE is a smart 4D L-Track massage chair, controlled by a touch pad. With an L-Track design, the Qi SE is able to massage the entire length of your back, from your neck to under your glutes. In addition to sole rollers and foot and calf compression, the Qi SE has heated knee compression massage that is adjustable to massage the upper calf as well. The Cozzia Qi SE also has upgraded mood lighting that we call "Chromotherapy 2.0." The LED lighting, which is positioned in the headrest of the Qi SE, provides color therapy through patterns of varying colors. The Qi SE also features: heated rollers, bluetooth speakers for playing music, 60 airbags for full body air compression, and the ability to create and save a custom massage.
The benefits of massage are to help you unwind, improve circulation, live longer, and improve flexibility. This massage chair will work on your neck, shoulders, back, lower back, arms, hips, glutes, knees, calves and feet and works on a height range of 5' to 6'5" with multiple types of massage and intensity ranging from relaxing to intense while supporting up to 265 lbs.
• L-Track Massage-the Cozzia Qi SE has a 4D L-Track that is able to massage from your neck down under your glutes.
• Knee Massage-the Cozzia Qi SE has heated air compression sleeves on the legs that move up and down automatically to massage both the knees and calves.
• Vario Motion Massage that feels less like a robot, and more like a human. The Cozzia Qi’s Vario Motion™ mechanism provides the most human-like massage in the industry.
• Light up your mood with the Qi SE has unique LED chromotherapy lighting that moves in patterns and changes colors depending on the option you choose.
• The ultimate heated dual rollers – so with every massage stroke you will feel heat on your back.
• Instant access to begin your massage as the Qi SE has controls on the armrest for easy access.
• Advanced reflexology via the Qi SE has tri-action foot rollers that use two levels of shiatsu foot rolling combined with immersive air pressure massage to create deep tissue foot massage.
• A chair that fits anywhere as the Qi SE is wall saving with a compact design that only needs to be placed 5 inches from the wall.

Cozzia Concierge Service - Cozzia pride ourselves in our unmatched customer experience. We promise to provide quick and painless customer service, with knowledgeable and well-trained representatives and technicians always around to help.
• In Home Repair Service - when needed, Cozzia will send technicians to your home to repair your chair.
• If We Can’t Repair It, We’ll Replace It - if Cozzia technicians are unable to fix your chair, Cozzia will replace it for free.
• Extended Coverage Available - extended warranty available through Cozzia.

categories: Default Category/Massage Chairs,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating/Massage Chairs
name: Cozzia ZEN 641 Massage Chair
description:
Cozzia ZEN 641 Massage Chair is one of the more popular model massage chair offered by Cozzia. The benefits of massage are to help you unwind, improve circulation, live longer, and improve flexibility. This massage chair will work on your neck, shoulders, back, lower back, arms, hips, glutes, knees, calves and feet and works on a height range of 5' to 6'5" with multiple types of massage and intensity ranging from relaxing to intense while supporting up to 320 lbs.
Bluetooth Connectivity to connect your smart device to the Cozzia Zen’s speakers using Bluetooth.
Sit Like an Astronaut with Zero Gravity Position which mimics the position astronauts take during liftoff for a space mission. This position reduces compression of the spine and improves blood flow.
Maximus coverage as the Cozzia Zen has a 2D L-Track that is able to massage from your neck down to under your glutes.
Adjustability at your fingertip through the Cozzia Zen is controlled by a smart touch pad remote. You’ll have the ability to quickly choose one of our auto programs, or create a custom massage tailored to your every need.
Heated Knee Therapy in the Zen has heated air compression sleeves on the legs that move up and down automatically to massage both the knees and calves.
Give your feet a break and the rest of your body will follow - did you know that the reflex zones located in the soles of your feet can affect your entire body? We have included rollers in the footrest of this chair to massage the undersides of your feet, and to benefit your body as a whole.
Powerful Sound to play music through your massage chair. We have built-in speakers into the headrest of the massage chair to provide you with the ability to listen to your favorite tunes while relaxing in your chair.
Cozzia Concierge Service - Cozzia pride ourselves in our unmatched customer experience. We promise to provide quick and painless customer service, with knowledgeable and well-trained representatives and technicians always around to help.
In Home Repair Service - when needed, Cozzia will send technicians to your home to repair your chair.
If We Can’t Repair It, We’ll Replace It - if Cozzia technicians are unable to fix your chair, Cozzia will replace it for free.
Extended Coverage Available - extended warranty available through Cozzia.

categories: Default Category/Massage Chairs,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating,Landmark Categories/Specialty Seating/Massage Chairs
name: Cozzia ZEN SE 640 Massage Chair
description:
Cozzia ZEN SE 640 Massage Chair is one of the more popular model massage chair offered by Cozzia. The benefits of massage are to help you unwind, improve circulation, live longer, and improve flexibility. This massage chair will work on your neck, shoulders, back, lower back, arms, hips, glutes, knees, calves and feet and works on a height range of 5' to 6'5" with multiple types of massage and intensity ranging from relaxing to intense while supporting up to 320 lbs.
Bluetooth Connectivity to connect your smart device to the Cozzia Zen’s SE speakers using Bluetooth.
Sit Like an Astronaut with Zero Gravity Position which mimics the position astronauts take during liftoff for a space mission. This position reduces compression of the spine and improves blood flow.
Maximus coverage as the Cozzia Zen SE has a 2D L-Track that is able to massage from your neck down to under your glutes.
Adjustability at your fingertip through the Cozzia Zen SE is controlled by a smart touch pad remote. You’ll have the ability to quickly choose one of our auto programs, or create a custom massage tailored to your every need.
Foot and Calf Massage - did you know that the reflex zones located in the soles of your feet can affect your entire body? We have included rollers in the footrest of this chair to massage the undersides of your feet, and to benefit your body as a whole.
Shoulder adjustability with a push of the shoulder panel, you can widen or contract the shoulder width of the chair.
8 auto programs to provide a quick massage that’s already been thought out by out massage specialists? Jump into this chair and choose one of the 8 pre-set programs.
Cozzia Concierge Service - Cozzia pride ourselves in our unmatched customer experience. We promise to provide quick and painless customer service, with knowledgeable and well-trained representatives and technicians always around to help.
In Home Repair Service - when needed, Cozzia will send technicians to your home to repair your chair.
If We Can’t Repair It, We’ll Replace It - if Cozzia technicians are unable to fix your chair, Cozzia will replace it for free.
Extended Coverage Available - extended warranty available through Cozzia.

name: Crown Mark Iris Marble Top Dark Brown Vanity
description: The Crown Mark Iris Marble Top Vanity and stool will add a fashionable and classic furniture combination to your home with this unique and distinctive vanity table with stool combination. Featuring straight tapered legs on both the stool and table, as well as a center storage drawer with knob pull hardware for accessory storage, this piece is as functional as it is fashionable. The top side features a tilting vertical mirror, and the stool is made more comfortable by a plush upholstered top and a rich dark brown finish.

name: Crown Mark Matrix 5 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Matrix 5 Piece Table Set is sleek and modern in design, this five piece dinette set is a classy and fresh addition to the kitchen, dining, or bar area in your home. This set features contoured and supported black metal base frames on both the table and chairs. The four side chairs in this set feature light upholstered seats and chair backs, and the table features a sizable glass top which lets through light and adds the feeling of space to the room.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

Crown Mark Vesper 6 Piece Table Set presents an easy-going transitional style with elevated details. The gorgeous 72" marble top rests on a modern trestle base. The combination of elegance from the table and softness of the warm grey upholstery gives this dining set great personality. The light brown finish pulls all the pieces together, creating a warm, inviting environment.

name: Crown Mark Blake Round 5 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Blake Round 5 Piece Table Set is five piece dining set boasts a slim, sleek, modern design that is perfect for smaller scale homes or relaxed hangout spaces. The gray finish of the table top and chair seats and seat backs accentuate the wood's grain, while also displaying a neutral and versatile color that will be at home in any style space. The unique table base, which features angular legs that converge halfway down and diverge again to the floor, contribute to this set's contemporary design. The chairs have an open seat back design to continue the sparse, but stylish, motif.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

categories: Landmark Categories/Dining,Landmark Categories/Dining/Dining Room Collections\/Sets
name: Crown Mark Mila Round 5 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Mila Round 5 Piece Table Set you'll be making a contemporary statement in your dining room. The round glass table, with a black band around the edge, features a suspended platform beneath the table top, connected by the legs, and can be used as a shelf for smaller dining items or for making space on the actual top. The sleek metal legs match those of the side chairs and continue with the contemporary design. The chairs are all upholstered in a black finish and feature a white stitching trim. Their unique seat back pattern, which features four square cutouts running down the length, offers an extra modern look, while the seat back extends below the seat for a special look all its own.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

name: Crown Mark Camelia Counter Height Round Espresso 5 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Camelia Counter Height Round Espresso 5 Piece Table Set crafts a beautiful dining space with this counter height table and stool set. A pedestal style base on the table includes a spacious shelf and curvaceous leg supports that add visual interest. A beveled glass table top is round in shape, providing plenty of room for dining and entertaining and staying safe without sharp corners. Accompanied are four espresso and brown upholstered counter stools. The upholstered seat and seat backs offer comfort and repose, while the upholstery brings a formal look and feel to the ensemble.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

Crown Mark Sarah Round 5 Piece Table Set is a casual dining room table which is an excellent addition to a breakfast nook or smaller scale dining area. The stylish metal pedestal base features scroll detailing and has a dark finish, providing a nice contrast to the light color of the wooden table top. This table paired with chair from this collection with matching metal scroll designs for a casual, yet stylish dining set. The chair features a comfortable upholstered seat and a backrest with a scroll motif centered around a circular detail. The upholstered seat is finished in soft brown color that provides a nice contrast to the dark metal frame of the chair.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

name: Crown Mark Bardstown Grey 6 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Bardstown Grey 6 Piece Table Set comes with a plank top which adds rustic style to this contemporary style dining table that is sophisticated enough for guests or daily use with your family. The rectangular table extends from 64 inches in length to 82 inches long with 18-inch leaf. The versatile leaf adds flexibility for hosting friends and family. Slightly tapered block feet complete the table's style. This dining side chair with a gray fabric upholstered seat adds contemporary style and comfort. Use the chair at either of the two choices of rectangular dining table. The smooth, ladder back style backrest completes the sleek look of the chair. This modern bench adds great seating to complement the rectangular dining table. The tufted upholstery seat with the look of gray fabric adds chic sophistication to this contemporary-style bench.
• Set includes table, 4 side chairs, and bench

name: Crown Mark Maldives Counter Height 6 Piece Table Set
description:
Crown Mark Maldives Counter Height 6 Piece Table Set brings a relaxed and casual ambiance to your dining space. Simply designed, it features one dining table, five side chairs, and one bench. The table has a rectangular table top shape with one 18" leaf, allowing you to accommodate large gatherings. Woodwork on each piece is crafted with a warm brown finish that emanates rich tones. The table is lifted on thick, counter height square tapered legs for a simplistic styling. A faux leather upholstered seat on the chairs and hi-back bench offer comfort and a pretty complement to the woodwork with dark brown upholstery. Lifted on square tapered legs with support stretchers and decorated with ladderback seat backs, the chairs offer single seating options around the table. The upholstered bench adds a convenient alternative to seat multiple people along one end of the table.
• Set includes table, 4 chairs, and bench

name: Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Round 7 Piece Table Set
description:
Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Round 7 Piece Table Set is constructed from the more dense and heavy Ponderosa pine. The table is distressed giving it old world look and has a long lasting lacquer Old West finish to give it the modern feel. The table edge are adorn with decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads and wrought iron forged band to enhance its rustic old world charm. The distress table top is rough with ridges and wood plank groves exposed to give it the rustic appearance, but it's been sanded, buffed, stained and lacquered seal for a smooth touch. Decorative pedestal base adds stability to the table. The beautifully crafted rustic leather dining chair features include made from 100% distressed pine wood to give it the old world look, and a lacquer seal to give it the modern feel. Leather seat and back with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads around the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. Comes already assembled. It is a beautiful statement table for any home with the rustic high end look.
• Set includes table and 6 chairs

name: Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda 8' Double Pedestal 8 Piece Table Set
description:
Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda 8' Double Pedestal 8 Piece Table Set is constructed from the more dense and heavy Ponderosa pine. The table is distressed giving it old world look and has a long lasting lacquer Old West finish to give it the modern feel. The table edge are adorn with decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads and wrought iron forged band to enhance its rustic old world charm. The distress table top is rough with ridges and wood plank groves exposed to give it the rustic appearance, but it's been sanded, buffed, stained and lacquered seal for a smooth touch. Decorative pedestal base adds stability to the table. The beautifully crafted rustic leather side chairs and cowhide arm chairs feature include made from 100% distressed pine wood to give it the old world look, and a lacquer seal to give it the modern feel. Leather seat and back with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads around the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. The beautifully crafted rustic cowhide arm chair features leather seat and cowhide back with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads around the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. Chairs come already assembled. The beautifully crafted rustic leather bench have the same features including made from 100% distressed pine wood, and a lacquer seal to give it the modern feel. Leather seat with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads around the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. It is a beautiful statement table for any home with the rustic high end look.

PLEASE NOTE, EACH COWHIDE IS DIFFERENT IN DESIGN, STYLE AND COLOR, PLUS THEY WILL NOT MATCH FROM ONE CHAIR TO ANOTHER. SO EXPECT COWHIDE COLOR, STYLE & DESIGN VARIATIONS

categories: Landmark Categories/Dining,Landmark Categories/Dining/Dining Room Collections\/Sets
name: Najarian Venezia Gray Round 5 Piece Table Set
description:
Najarian Venezia Gray Round 5 Piece Table Set is a 21st-century classic is the best way to describe the Venezia Dining collection. The heraldry symbol of the Chevron is used to create a gorgeous contemporary style while harkening back to a time of opulent elegance. Crafted from rubberwood solids and oak veneers, the set includes a table and six side chairs. The table features antiqued and grooved mirror insets and the chairs are upholstered in gray fabric with a herringbone stitch pattern. Clean lines and a smooth gray finish give this set an elegant contemporary look. Using antiqued mirror with a signature gray finish on the wood frames, the Venezia is at once both subtle and striking. Impress your dinner party guests with this alluring collection.
• Set includes table and 4 chairs

name: Standard Omaha Grey Counter Height 6 Piece Table Set
description:
Standard Omaha Grey Counter Height 6 Piece Table Set is finished in a weathered, burnished grey color, creating a rustic atmosphere. The table features a unique trestle base and a rectangular top with simple line molding on each side. It also has two 13-inch leaves, extending the table from 70 to 96 inches. The dining stools feature a stylish X-pattern on the backrests and simple tapering legs. Not only stylish but, the seating is also comfortable, with seats upholstered in a neutral grey fabric. The bench offers slip seat cushions covered in easy care leather-look brown PU fabric, X-back design and square legs with chamfered foot.
• Set includes table, 4 chairs, and bench

name: Standard McGregor 7 Piece Table Set
description:
Standard McGregor 7 Piece Table Set will encourage you to invite your family and friends around this stunning traditional styled table and chair set for the perfect place to enjoy a meal together in handsome style. Turned legs and birch veneers completed in a warm Midnight Brown finish give this set elegant richness that won't go understated in your home. One 18 inch leaf extends the table to 90 inches so you always have room for your family and friends to enjoy dinner together. The upholstered seat and seat backs of the side chairs are accented by nail head trim to give this chair a beautiful elegance. Traditional style will fill your dining room with this handsome addition.
• Set includes table and 6 chairs

categories: Landmark Categories/Dining,Landmark Categories/Dining/Dining Room Seating
name: Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Herradura Leather/Cowhide Pair of Side/Arm Chairs
description:
Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Herradura Leather Pair of Side Chairs is a beautiful crafted chair for a high end rustic look. The beautifully crafted rustic leather dining chair features include made from 100% distressed pine wood to give it the old world look, and a lacquer seal to give it the modern feel. Leather seat and back with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads at the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. Comes already assembled.

 

Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Cowhide Pair of Arm Chairs is constructed from the more dense and heavy Ponderosa pine. The beautifully crafted rustic cowhide arm chair features leather seat and cowhide back with a decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads at the side of the seat enhances its rustic old world charm. Chairs come already assembled. It is a beautiful statement table for any home with the rustic high end look.

PLEASE NOTE, EACH COWHIDE IS DIFFERENT IN DESIGN, STYLE AND COLOR, PLUS THEY WILL NOT MATCH FROM ONE CHAIR TO ANOTHER. SO EXPECT COWHIDE COLOR, STYLE & DESIGN VARIATIONS

categories: Landmark Categories/Dining,Landmark Categories/Dining/Dining Room Tables
name: Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Round Table
description: Lone Star Rustic Gran Hacienda Round Table is constructed from the more dense and heavy Ponderosa pine. The table is distressed giving it old world look and has a long lasting lacquer Old West finish to give it the modern feel. The table edge are adorn with decorative metal band with clovas or nail heads and wrought iron forged band to enhance its rustic old world charm. The distress table top is rough with ridges and wood plank groves exposed to give it the rustic appearance, but it's been sanded, buffed, stained and lacquered seal for a smooth touch. Decorative pedestal base adds stability to the table. It is a beautiful statement table for any home with the rustic high end look.

categories: Default Category/Sleep Accessories,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Frames,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Frames
name: Mantua Craftlock Twin/Twin XL Bed Frame
description: Mantua's CraftLock® bed frame uses a wedge-lock style leg that makes the frame stronger as more weight is applied. High-carbon, ribbed steel side rails provide maximum support for the mattress and box spring. Additional foot clearance is added with the use of our recessed leg design. No nuts and bolts mean no tools are needed for assembly. Includes four legs with nylon rollers (6 with center or double center support for Queen/King/Cal King) for added mobility. Two rollers have brakes to lock the bed in place. Supports up to 1800 pounds.

categories: Default Category/Sleep Accessories,Default Category/Sleep Accessories/Frames,Landmark Categories/Mattresses,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories,Landmark Categories/Mattresses/Sleep Accessories/Frames
name: Mantua Platform Twin Bed Frame
description:
Mantua's Premium Platform Bed Bases provide long-lasting support for mattresses with no need for a box spring. With all-metal construction, these bed bases help eliminate the places where bed bugs can hide. Each base can fold for transport, making the bases ideal for temporary bedding.
This platform base can be used inside a headboard/footboard and side rail system, or independently to replace a bed frame and box spring. Each bed is 14" off the floor, which creates ample room for storage underneath the platform. Because no tools are needed for assembly, setup is quick and easy. Supports up to 2000 pounds.

A small drawer on the cocktail table offers storage for remotes and other family room essentials. Turn your living room into a functional area with these stylish accent tables.
• Set includes 1 cocktail table and 2 end tables

This sectional features comfortable seating with its padded back pillows, supportive and plush seat cushions with sinuous springs for durability. It features padded rolled arms, sectioned front border, and six contrasting accent pillows. Optional cocktail ottoman is available.
• Set includes Left Arm Facing Sofa, a Right Arm Facing Tux Sofa, and a Right Arm Facing chaise

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets
name: Best Brodie Camel Leather Set
description:
Best Brodie Camel Leather Set you get sophisticated furniture worthy of your home. Best Home Furnishings' Bodie Leather collection seamlessly blends with almost any décor. Update your living space with the traditional class of smooth top-grain leather. Stuffed with premium cushioning fibers, the slightly rolled pillow arms and fully cushioned chaise-pad seat deliver the comfort you need for ultimate relaxation. Adjustable kick-out recliner mechanism with gravity-activated handle assist for effortless reclining. Durable hardwood frame provides years of use. Details like the hourglass-shaped lower arms and single-seam-line accenting add understated elegance. Supple and smooth top-grain leather provides exceptional comfort and class. The sofa and loveseat recline with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It will be utilizing a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor. The loveseat has a center storage area as well as drink holders for added functionality. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

name: Catnapper Elliot Chocolate Power Sectional
description:
Catnapper Elliot Chocolate Power Sectional creates a space in your home built for rainy day hangouts with this reclining sectional sofa. The lay flat reclining capabilities provides you with a perfect place to snuggle up and take a luxurious nap. The plush and soft cushions along with the pillow topped arms continue to add comfort family and friends won't be able to resist. Other features such as the storage console complete with cup holders add extra functionality to this sectional sofa. Optional glider recliner is available.
• Set includes Left Side Facing and Right Side Facing pieces

name: Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Set
description:
Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Set brings warmth and style into your living room. Beautifully designed and made using quality materials, it boasts a strong frame and soft yet resilient upholstery. Extra soft cushions ensure you experience a comfort level like no other. Finished in rich tones of chocolate leather with comfort-gel technology is also a refreshing relief as it gives you a better and cooler experience. The power headrest, recliner and lumber features in both the sofa and loveseat will allow you to fully experience the lay flat positioning while giving flexibility to your head positioning and providing lower back support tailored to your needs. Optional full power plus lumbar recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

name: Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Sectional
description:
What the Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Sectional offers is hard to match by other living room set. The designers really thought of the whole family when they created this living room set. It is the epitome of style, durability and luxury. Boasting Italian leather as their primary upholstery, the pieces of furniture in the Milan collection are sturdy not just in their inner frames but their covers as well. Italian leather is the zenith of leather excellence, and a Catnapper furniture is beauty given form. Its strong and resilient frame is made using quality wood and lumber and provides superior support. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. Finished in rich tones of chocolate, it serves to brighten up any living room with its beauty and warmth. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa, Loveseat, and Wedge

name: Catnapper Portman Saddle Power Set
description:
Catnapper Portman Saddle Power Set is the perfect set to have in your home. Finished in a two-tone saddle patchwork design color and texture complimented with luggage stitching, it brings back the comfort of traditional living while still offering functionality with next generation contemporary styling. Made with quality materials, it guarantees strength and durability. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. The faux leather cover is soft and durable and the power recline in both the sofa and loveseat will give you unparalleled comfort without punching a hole in your wallet. Optional power recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

name: Catnapper Reyes Chocolate Power Set
description:
Catnapper Reyes Chocolate Power Set boasts form and function that is hard pressed to match in other living rooms sets. Durable and resilient, it will become a permanent fixture in your home for many years to come. A strong and resilient frame is made using quality wood and lumber and provides superior support. Its cushions and made to be extra soft and plush for superior comfort. Beautifully finished in warm tones of chocolate, it is the perfect living room set to have at home. The sofa and loveseat both come with power and recline into a lay flat position for complete comfort in a position that best fits your body. The loveseat includes a center storage with cupholders for added functionality and convenience. Optional power recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sectionals
name: Catnapper Voyager Brandy Power Sectional
description:
Catnapper Voyager Brandy Power Sectional will embark you on a voyage to dreamland as the Catnapper Voyager gives you a ride to the sleeping paradise during your siesta. Once you are awake, the Voyager will accompany you to another adventure – the journey towards the charm you never knew you wanted! Only the finest materials and design, such as the Printed Polyester Faux Leather Fabric and sewn tufted back treatment with decorative stitching. This power sofa has the ultimate in function with the recline seating and drop down table and cup holder in the middle. The power loveseat has a built in center console for storage as well as drink holders to go along with the dual power reclining seating. The wedge adds comfort without feeling cramped with the larger footprint in the front. Optional power recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa, Loveseat, and Wedge

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets
name: Catnapper Westin Ash Power Set
description:
Catnapper Westin Ash Power Set features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Soft, padded polyester faux leather upholsters each piece, and recessed arm panels with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too which is not good. Catnapper is one of the few manufacturers to offer zipper access to key areas of the furniture. Soft and Durable are two words that often don’t go together in the furniture world. With Catnapper, Soft and Durable is possible. Often with high use, the soft areas of your sofa will start showing signs of wear or sagging. This usually occurs in the backs and reclining chaise (footrest) areas. Catnapper has allowed easy access to these areas, via zippers, for re-stuffing. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat.
additional_attributes:
additional_sku=61051-SOF-1304-56, 61052-LSC-1304-56,availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Catnapper,closeout=No,color_input=Ash,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Sofa: 89.5" W x 41" D x 42" H
  • Loveseat: 66" W x 42" D x 41" H
,features=
  • Comfort gel coil seating
  • 15 gauge heat tempered coils for support and durability
  • Foam and fiber encased for long lasting shape and comfort
  • Individually pocketed coils for a quiet seating experience
  • Exclusive reclining mechanism for smooth and quiet operation
  • Steel seat box for no warping or splitting like wood
  • Unitized steel base to resist bending
  • Direct drive cross bar for no side to side tilt
  • 8 gauge spring system for seat strength and comfort
  • Traditional design
  • Soft padded seat
  • Pub back
  • Upholstered in faux leather fabric
  • Recessed arm panel
  • Decorative nail head
  • Power button with USB port
  • Fabric Content: 100% Polyester
,material=Faux Leather,product_line_input=Westin,style=Contemporary,type_input=Sofa Love Set

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets
name: Catnapper Westin Tanner Set
description:
Catnapper Westin Tanner Set features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Soft, padded polyester faux leather upholsters each piece, and recessed arm panels with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too which is not good. Catnapper is one of the few manufacturers to offer zipper access to key areas of the furniture. Soft and Durable are two words that often don’t go together in the furniture world. With Catnapper, Soft and Durable is possible. Often with high use, the soft areas of your sofa will start showing signs of wear or sagging. This usually occurs in the backs and reclining chaise (footrest) areas. Catnapper has allowed easy access to these areas, via zippers, for re-stuffing. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sectionals
name: Franklin Dakota Smoke Sectional
description:
Franklin Dakota Smoke Sectional has such a presence to it with its generously padded back, lumbar support and arm rests that your guests will want to run to it and sit down. This sectional is everything you need whether it's for a movie or game night or just a night in. With the Wow Seating System, a unique combination of premium springs and gel injected seating foam that comes together to deliver the best seat in the marketplace today and don't forget this also reclines which is an added bonus to this piece. These frames are rock solid and are made of kiln dried hardwood. The springs used will provide durability to the pieces over the years. They also use high density foam in the cushions which will provide you with a firm but soft feel. The sectional can be created many ways to provide the exact set up desired for your home. There is a sofa with a table, a loveseat with a console, a seating wedge and optional recliners. The upholstery of this set is bonded leather which just means that they combine leather and fabric which will have a soft feel to it, but will also greatly reduce the price versus a full leather piece. It is stain and scuff resilient and will wear very well over time. Optional recliner is available.
• Set Includes Sofa, Loveseat, and Wedge

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets
name: Jackson Drummond Dusk Set
description:
Jackson Drummond Dusk Set is so buttery soft and sumptuous you'd swear it was made from your favorite leather coat, but in reality a meticulously crafted microfiber alternative that is a little warmer and a little easier to care for than its counterparts. With exposed channel stitching on its back, seat, and sides, this robust sofa evokes a contemporary western vibe, but feels right at home in a variety of settings in its dusk color. Excellent loft within the channels gives this set just the right amount of support and body-surrounding comfort. The Jackson Furniture line's Comfort Coil Cushion system is unmatched in support and durability. Fifty individually pocketed foam-encased coils within the cushion allow independent movement resulting in a superior seating experience, while state-of-the-art gel-infused memory foam inserts cradle the user in cool, whisper-soft relaxation. Frames are constructed of hardwoods and plywood's with coil cushion core construction. Features include pillow top arms and deep seating to complement your cozy retreat or relaxed entertaining spot. Optional chair and a half and ottoman are available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

name: Leather Italia Fresno Brown Leather Power Set
description:
The Leather Italia Fresno Brown Leather Power Set screams, "Come home to comfort!" This is a versatile group. Its modern scale yields generous seating area and makes it easy to put just about anywhere in the home. The Fresno has clean, sophisticated styling with flared pad on arm application and the plush comfort of a double back cushion. The set is powered so you can recline with just the touch of a button to find the position that is just right for you to relax! Optional power recliner is available in addition to matching ottoman.
• Set Includes Sofa and Loveseat

description:

With the simple pull of a handle, the two end seats of the sofa recline into a more relaxing position while the center drops down to be used as a console. Not just comfy, the seats are scooped with deep channel designs and have pillow-top arms. The matching loveseat also has two reclining seats but has a built in center console has two metal cup holders to keep beverages safe and a handy compartment for stashing remotes or other small items. Optional rocker recliner is available.
• Set Includes Sofa and Loveseat

Optional chair is available.

description:

The set includes a beautiful pad over chaise double reclining sofa and console loveseat that features biscuit tufted seat and pub back in a 100% polyester cover, double padded cushion arms and pocketed coil seating to give you ultimate comfort. It is constructed on a sturdy corner-blocked solid wood frame with metal reinforced seats and footrests. The loveseat has a center console storage area and cup holders for added convenience. Optional recliner is available.

description:
Simmons Palermo Shale Sectional is filled with plush comfort, cozy style and convenient functionality, what more can you ask for in a sectional? This sectional features padding everywhere your body will lean with large pillow arms, a bustled back rest and fully supportive footrest. This sectional is equipped with a drop-down table on the left-facing sofa as well as a storage console and cupholders on the right-facing console loveseat. Create the functional and inviting living room you've been imagining, starting with this reclining sectional. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa, Loveseat, and Wedge

name: Best Retreat Chestnut Set
description:
Best Retreat Chestnut Leather Set will have you feeling like you are quickly floating away to your treasured oasis where worries don’t exist in one sitting. The generous size allows you to sink into this plush haven courtesy of the overstuffed seats and backs filled with extravagant amounts of pillow cushioning fibers. With an exclusive reclining mechanism focusing on all the comfort touch points, the long-awaited vacation is now at home. The sofa and loveseat recline with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It will be utilizing a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor. The loveseat has a center storage area as well as drink holders for added functionality. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

name: Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Set
description:
Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Set is a reclining sofa and loveseat set that stands out from the rest. The generously padded back offers unparalleled support, while the soft leather lends a sophisticated touch that will complete any room. Plump pillow arms and line-tufted detail complete the alluring design of this set. Whether you are kicking back to watch the game with some friends or sharing popcorn during a family movie night, this set will be there with you through it all. With Best Home Furnishings' unique recline design, you can place this sofa virtually right up against the wall. The sofa and loveseat recline with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. Optional recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat
additional_attributes:
additional_sku=S501CA4-L-71295, L501CA4-L-71295, 9MW27LV-L-71295,availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Best Home,closeout=No,color_input=Saddle,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Sofa: 87.5" W x 38" D x 39.5" H
  • Loveseat: 62.5" W x 38" D x 39.5" H
,features=
  • Wall-saver recliner mechanisms slide slightly forward instead of straight back, allowing you to keep your recliner close to a wall.
  • Built-in console to store remotes, chargers, and other small items that could easily get lost in the depths of cushions.
  • Cup Holders to keep your drink within reach as you enjoy a movie or a sporting event. Having built in cup holders also helps eliminate spills and stains.
  • No-Gap Chaise Cushion that extends from the seat to the feet. This style offers fuller comfort and support for your legs, and eliminates the open gap that toddlers can get fingers or toys stuck in.

name: Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Set
description:
What the Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Set offers is hard to match by other living room set. The designers really thought of the whole family when they created this living room set. It is the epitome of style, durability and luxury. Boasting Italian leather as their primary upholstery, the pieces of furniture in the Milan collection are sturdy not just in their inner frames but their covers as well. Italian leather is the zenith of leather excellence, and Catnapper furniture is beauty given form. Its strong and resilient frame is made using quality wood and lumber and provides superior support. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. Finished in rich tones of chocolate, it serves to brighten up any living room with its beauty and warmth. Optional manual recliner is available.
• Set includes Sofa and Loveseat

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Living Room Collections\/Sets
name: Franklin Hector Shadow Set
description:
Franklin Hector Shadow Set give you everything you need for a comfortable, cozy night in. This sofa not only provides you with an ultra-comfortable place for two to sit, it offers you the convenience of a table right within the furnishing. The drop down table can be pulled down from the center of the sofa where its padded support keeps it at a comfortable height between the seats on either side. The two seats are ultra spacious and wide to give you plenty of room to curl up in any position. On either side of the sofa are plush, supportive saddle arms that can support your no matter how far back you are reclined. The loveseat is a rocking and reclining loveseat. Faux leather upholstery adds an elegant finishing touch. This collection features Franklin’s exclusive Wow Seating System, a unique combination of premium springs and gel injected seating foam that come together to deliver the best seat in the market place today. Optional recliner is available.
•Set Includes Sofa, and Loveseat

name: Happy Homes Chanel Brown Set
description:
Happy Homes Chanel Brown Set oozes class with the diamond tufted design in a dark brown leather gel that is accented by thick beige stitching. It has overstuffed headrests and extra padding in the lumber region so you are still supported in all areas when you recline. It has wide but thin arms which provide a comfortable seating experience without giving you the feeling of being swallowed by the arms. The sofa and loveseat both have dual reclining chairs with recess reclining release providing a cleaner look. The loveseat has a center console storage unit and cupholders adding convince and functionality. The matching rocker recliner is a nice touch that completes the set.
• Set includes Sofa, Loveseat, and Rocker Recliner

name: Happy Homes McKenzie Chocolate Sectional
description:
Happy Homes McKenzie Chocolate Sectional brings an upscale style to any room with the large diamond stitch design, thick contrast color baseball stitching and heavy duty chocolate cover. It comes with large headrest cushions, extra padding in the lumber region and wide stuff armrests. This sectional has two loveseats with center consoles and cup holders. Only the outside seat on the loveseats recline. The wedge has dual split back cushions and a large front opening to provide for easier access and comfort. Each piece has hidden anchors to keep the pieces together providing a tighter, cleaner look.
• Set includes LAF Loveseat, Wedge, and RAF Loveseat

name: Happy Homes Olivia Grey Sectional
description:
Happy Homes Olivia Grey Sectional is great transitional sectional for those with limited space. It is a loveseat with a single recliner and center console on the right side and the left side has a chaise to be able to stretch out. It is covered in a neutral grey fabric, comes with over stuffed arms, extra large back cushions for comfort and support. The recline mechanism is recess to help provide a smoother look. The center console comes with two drink holders for added convenience. For those with limited space this set should be looked at very thoroughly.
• Set includes RAF Loveseat and LAF Chaise

name: Leather Italia Winnfield Taupe Leather Power Set
description:
The Leather Italia Winnfield Taupe Leather Power set screams, "Come home to comfort!" Its a versatile group. Its modern scale yields generous seating area and makes it easy to put just about anywhere in the home. The Winnfield has clean, sophisticated styling with flared pad on arm application and the plush comfort of a double back cushion. The sofa has a hidden, center seat foldout console with cup holders. The set is powered so you can recline with just the touch of a button to find the position that is just right for you to relax! Optional power recliner is available in addition to matching ottoman.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Chair\/Ottomans
name: Jackson Drummond Dusk Chair and a Half
description: Jackson Drummond Dusk Chair and a Half is so buttery soft and sumptuous you'd swear it was made from your favorite leather coat, but in reality its a meticulously crafted microfiber alternative that is a little warmer and a little easier to care for than its counterparts. With exposed channel stitching on its back, seat, and sides, this robust sofa evokes a contemporary western vibe, but feels right at home in a variety of settings with its dusk color. Excellent loft within the channels gives this set just the right amount of support and body-surrounding comfort.

Stone & Leigh Whitfield Beige Set screams, "Sit back in comfort!" The sock arms, T-shaped back, and walnut finished turned legs offer plenty of style even in the most casual of home settings. The comfortable beige colored back cushions come with multiple compartments to keep the fiber evenly distributed along with the top layer foam, along with the tight tailored backs. It has clean lines to keep cushion corners smooth and has hand stitching. The durable seat covers that exceed industry standards yield little wear and tear. The seat cushions with sinuous spring coil technology and high resiliency foam lead to a longer lasting cushion with that new cushion feel. This amazing set is accented with nail trim and accented pillows to complete the set. Optional chair and a half and ottoman are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Best Bodie Camel Leather Sofa
description: Best Bodie Camel Leather Sofa gives you sophisticated furniture worthy of your home. Best Home Furnishings' Bodie Leather collection seamlessly blends with almost any décor. Update your living space with the traditional class of smooth top-grain leather. Stuffed with premium cushioning fibers, the slightly rolled pillow arms and fully cushioned chaise-pad seat deliver the comfort you need for ultimate relaxation. Adjustable kick-out recliner mechanism with gravity-activated handle assist for effortless reclining. Durable hardwood frame provides years of use. Details like the hourglass-shaped lower arms and single-seam-line accenting add understated elegance. Supple and smooth top-grain leather provides exceptional comfort and class. The sofa reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It will be utilizing a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor. Optional loveseat and recliner are available.

name: Best Retreat Chestnut Sofa
description: Best Retreat Chestnut Leather Sofa will have you feeling like you are quickly floating away to your treasured oasis where worries don’t exist in one sitting. The generous size allows you to sink into this plush haven courtesy of the overstuffed seats and backs filled with extravagant amounts of pillow cushioning fibers. With an exclusive reclining mechanism focusing on all the comfort touch points, the long-awaited vacation is now at home. The sofa reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It will be utilizing a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor. Optional sofa and recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Sofa
description: Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Sofa is a reclining sofa that stands out from the rest. The generously padded back offers unparalleled support, while the soft leather lends a sophisticated touch that will complete any room. Plump pillow arms and line-tufted detail complete the alluring design of this sofa. Whether you are kicking back to watch the game with some friends or sharing popcorn during a family movie night, this sofa will be there with you through it all. With Best Home Furnishings' unique recline design, you can place this sofa virtually right up against the wall. The sofa reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. Optional loveseat and recliner are available.
additional_attributes:
additional_sku=BST-Zaynah-Saddle-Sofa,availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Best Home,closeout=No,color_input=Saddle,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Sofa: 87.5" W x 38" D x 39.5" H
,features=
  • Wall-saver recliner mechanisms slide slightly forward instead of straight back, allowing you to keep your recliner close to a wall.
  • Built-in console to store remotes, chargers, and other small items that could easily get lost in the depths of cushions.
  • Cup Holders to keep your drink within reach as you enjoy a movie or a sporting event. Having built in cup holders also helps eliminate spills and stains.
  • No-Gap Chaise Cushion that extends from the seat to the feet. This style offers fuller comfort and support for your legs, and eliminates the open gap that toddlers can get fingers or toys stuck in.

name: Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Sofa
description: Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Sofa brings warmth and style into your living room. Beautifully designed and made using quality materials, it boasts a strong frame and soft yet resilient upholstery. Extra soft cushions ensure you experience a comfort level like no other. Finished in rich tones of chocolate leather with comfort-gel technology is also a refreshing relief as it gives you a better and cooler experience. The power headrest, recliner and lumber features in the sofa will allow you to fully experience the lay flat positioning while giving flexibility to your head positioning and providing lower back support tailored to your needs. Optional full power plus lumbar loveseat and recliner are available.

name: Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Sofa
description: What the Catnapper Milan Chocolate Power Sofa offers is hard to match by other living room sofa. The designers really thought of the whole family when they created this living room set. It is the epitome of style, durability and luxury. Boasting Italian leather as their primary upholstery, the pieces of furniture in the Milan collection are sturdy not just in their inner frames but their covers as well. Italian leather is the zenith of leather excellence, and Catnapper furniture is beauty given form. Its strong and resilient frame is made using quality lumber and provides superior support. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. Finished in rich tones of chocolate, it serves to brighten up any living room with its beauty and warmth. Optional power loveseat and manual recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Catnapper Westin Ash Power Sofa
description: Catnapper Westin Ash Power Sofa features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Soft, padded polyester faux leather upholsters each piece, and recessed arm panels with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too which is not good. Catnapper is one of the few manufacturers to offer zipper access to key areas of the furniture. Soft and Durable are two words that often don’t go together in the furniture world. With Catnapper, Soft and Durable is possible. Often with high use, the soft areas of your sofa will start showing signs of wear or sagging. This usually occurs in the backs and reclining chaise (footrest) areas. Catnapper has allowed easy access to these areas, via zippers, for re-stuffing. Optional loveseat and recliner are available.
additional_attributes:
additional_sku=61051-SOF-1304-56,availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Catnapper,closeout=No,color_input=Ash,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Sofa: 89.5" W x 41" D x 42" H
,features=
  • Comfort gel coil seating
  • 15 gauge heat tempered coils for support and durability
  • Foam and fiber encased for long lasting shape and comfort
  • Individually pocketed coils for a quiet seating experience
  • Exclusive reclining mechanism for smooth and quiet operation
  • Steel seat box for no warping or splitting like wood
  • Unitized steel base to resist bending
  • Direct drive cross bar for no side to side tilt
  • 8 gauge spring system for seat strength and comfort
  • Traditional design
  • Soft padded seat
  • Pub back
  • Upholstered in faux leather fabric
  • Recessed arm panel
  • Decorative nail head
  • Power button with USB port

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Catnapper Westin Ash Sofa
description: Catnapper Westin Ash Sofa features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Soft, padded polyester faux leather upholsters each piece, and recessed arm panels with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too which is not good. Catnapper is one of the few manufacturers to offer zipper access to key areas of the furniture. Soft and Durable are two words that often don’t go together in the furniture world. With Catnapper, Soft and Durable is possible. Often with high use, the soft areas of your sofa will start showing signs of wear or sagging. This usually occurs in the backs and reclining chaise (footrest) areas. Catnapper has allowed easy access to these areas, via zippers, for re-stuffing. Optional loveseat and recliner are available.

  • Comfort gel coil seating
  • 15 gauge heat tempered coils for support and durability
  • Foam and fiber encased for long lasting shape and comfort
  • Individually pocketed coils for a quiet seating experience
  • Exclusive reclining mechanism for smooth and quiet operation
  • Steel seat box for no warping or splitting like wood
  • Unitized steel base to resist bending
  • Direct drive cross bar for no side to side tilt
  • 8 gauge spring system for seat strength and comfort
  • Traditional design

  • Pub back
  • Upholstered in faux leather fabric
  • Recessed arm panel
  • Decorative nail head
  • Fabric Content: 100% Polyester

name: Delta 4160 Vivid Onyx Sofa
description: Delta 4160 Vivid Onyx Sofa Give your living room and upgrade when you choose the stylish Onyx Collection! This stylish collection features a modern shape with a contrasting welting trim that takes its classy style to another level. The linen-like onyx upholstery is paired with the Winchester Midnight and Sullivan Onyx accent pillows which add the perfect amount of rich color and paisley print to the Sofa. The slightly flared and very square arm rests and pillow-back design keeps the sofa looking fresh and updated. Add this comfortable and fashionable sofa to your home today for a classy update! Optional loveseat is available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Franklin Hector Shadow Sofa
description: Franklin Hector Shadow Sofa gives you everything you need for a comfortable, cozy night in. This sofa not only provides you with an ultra-comfortable place for two to sit, it offers you the convenience of a table right within the furnishing. The drop down table can be pulled down from the center of the sofa where its padded support keeps it at a comfortable height between the seats on either side. The two seats are ultra spacious and wide to give you plenty of room to curl up in any position. On either side of the sofa are plush, supportive saddle arms that can support you no matter how far back you are reclined. Faux leather upholstery adds an elegant finishing touch. This collection features Franklin’s exclusive Wow Seating System, a unique combination of premium springs and gel injected seating foam that come together to deliver the best seat in the market place today. Optional loveseat and recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Franklin Hobbs Sandstone Sofa
description: Franklin Hobbs Sandstone Sofa offers a sophisticated transitional style with subtle textural layering. A refined look, the sofa and loveseat offer a linen undertone with T-cushions and track arms, along with tailored finishing accents in bold antique brass nail-head trim along the base of the front seat rail and lining the square-back pillow support. Completing the elegant arrangement, ornamental print throw pillows add a delightful element. Loose seat and back cushions are fully reversible for long wear and practicality. Franklin's WOW seating system delivers the best seating available with its unique combination of gel-injected seating foam and premium springs. Seat cushions are extra thick and designed to promote “sink into comfort”. Optional loveseat, chair and ottoman are available.

name: Franklin Richmond Walnut Sofa
description: Franklin Richmond Walnut Sofa offers contoured overstuffed seating and rounded wings and arms for an updated version of a traditional look. Beautifully presented in faux leather, this striking sofa is easier to maintain and more economical than its natural counterparts. Thick luggage stitching and brass nail-head trim around the arm fronts finish this exceptional Sofa in tailored detail. Plush seat backs and arms provide comfort you will look forward to again and again. With its gel-injected seating foam and premium springs, Franklin delivers the best seating available today in their remarkable WOW seating system. Optional loveseat and rocker recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Sofas
name: Jackson Drummond Dusk Sofa
description: Jackson Drummond Dusk Sofa is so buttery soft and sumptuous you'd swear it was made from your favorite leather coat, but in reality a meticulously crafted microfiber alternative that is a little warmer and a little easier to care for than its counterparts. With exposed channel stitching on its back, seat, and sides, this robust sofa evokes a contemporary western vibe, but feels right at home in a variety of settings in its dusk color. Excellent loft within the channels gives this sofa just the right amount of support and body-surrounding comfort. The Jackson Furniture line's Comfort Coil Cushion system is unmatched in support and durability. Fifty individually pocketed foam-encased coils within the cushion allow independent movement resulting in a superior seating experience, while state-of-the-art gel-infused memory foam inserts cradle the user in cool, whisper-soft relaxation. Frames are constructed of hardwoods and plywood's with coil cushion core construction. Features include pillow top arms and deep seating to complement your cozy retreat or relaxed entertaining spot. Optional loveseat, chair and a half and ottoman are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Recliners
name: Best Bodie Camel Leather Recliner
description: With Best Bodie Camel Leather Recliner you get sophisticated furniture worthy of your home. Best Home Furnishings' Bodie Leather collection seamlessly blends with almost any décor. Update your living space with the traditional class of smooth top-grain leather. Stuffed with premium cushioning fibers, the slightly rolled pillow arms and fully cushioned chaise-pad seat deliver the comfort you need for ultimate relaxation. Adjustable kick-out recliner mechanism with gravity-activated handle assist for effortless reclining. Durable hardwood frame provides years of use. Details like the hourglass-shaped lower arms, and the single-seam-line accenting add understated elegance. Supple and smooth top-grain leather provides exceptional comfort and class. The unit reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It also utilizes a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor.

Boasting Italian leather as their primary upholstery, the pieces of furniture in the Milan collection are sturdy not just in their inner frames but their covers as well. Italian leather is the zenith of leather excellence, and Catnapper furniture is beauty given form. Its strong and resilient frame is made using quality wood and lumber and provides superior support. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. Finished in rich tones of walnut, it serves to brighten up any living room with its beauty and warmth.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Recliners
name: Catnapper Westin Ash Power Recliner
description: Catnapper Westin Ash Power Recliner features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support. (where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too, which is not good.) Its covered by padded polyester faux leather upholstery, and recessed arm panels, with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system, infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency.
additional_attributes:
availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Catnapper,closeout=No,color_input=Ash,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Recliner: 41" W x 42" D x 43" H
,features=
  • Comfort gel coil seating
  • 15 gauge heat tempered coils for support and durability
  • Foam and fiber encased for long lasting shape and comfort
  • Individually pocketed coils for a quiet seating experience
  • Exclusive reclining mechanism for smooth and quiet operation
  • Steel seat box for no warping or splitting like wood
  • Unitized steel base to resist bending
  • Direct drive cross bar for no side to side tilt
  • 8 gauge spring system for seat strength and comfort
  • Traditional design
  • Soft padded seat
  • Pub back
  • Upholstered in faux leather fabric
  • Recessed arm panel
  • Decorative nail head
  • Power button with USB port
  • Fabric Content: 100% Polyester
,material=Faux Leather,product_line_input=Westin,style=Contemporary,type_input=Recliner

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Recliners
name: Franklin Dakota Smoke Recliner
description: Franklin Dakota Smoke Recliner has such a presence to it, with its generously padded back, lumbar support and arm rests, that your guests will want to run to it and sit down. This recliner is everything you need whether it's for a movie or game night, or just a night in. With the Wow Seating System, a unique combination of premium springs and gel injected seating foam that comes together to deliver the best seat in the marketplace today. And don't forget this piece reclines. These frames are rock solid and are made of kiln dried hardwood. The springs used will provide durability to the pieces over the years. They also use high density foam in the cushions which will provide you with a firm but soft feel. The upholstery of this set is bonded leather which, means they combine leather and fabric, which will have a soft feel to it, but will also greatly reduce the price versus a full leather piece. It is stain and scuff resilient and will wear very well over time.
additional_attributes:

name: Franklin Hector Shadow Recliner

name: Catnapper Westin Tanner Power Recliner
description: Catnapper Westin Tanner Power Recliner features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support. (where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too, which is not good.) Its covered by padded polyester faux leather upholstery, and recessed arm panels, with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system, infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency.

name: Best Bodie Camel Leather Loveseat
description: Best Bodie Camel Leather Loveseat gives you sophisticated furniture worthy of your home. Best Home Furnishings' Bodie Leather collection seamlessly blends with almost any décor. Update your living space with the traditional class of smooth top-grain leather. Stuffed with premium cushioning fibers, the slightly rolled pillow arms and fully cushioned chaise-pad seat deliver the comfort you need for ultimate relaxation. Adjustable kick-out recliner mechanism with gravity-activated handle assist for effortless reclining. Durable hardwood frame provides years of use. Details like the hourglass-shaped lower arms and single-seam-line accenting add understated elegance. Supple and smooth top-grain leather provides exceptional comfort and class. The loveseat reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. It utilizes a patent pending bracketing system that prevents the seats from separating on the floor. It has a center console for storage along with cup holders for convenience. Optional sofa and recliner are available.

name: Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Loveseat
description: Best Zaynah Saddle Leather Loveseat is a reclining loveseat that stands out from the rest. The generously padded back offers unparalleled support, while the soft leather lends a sophisticated touch that will complete any room. Plump pillow arms and line-tufted detail complete the alluring design of this loveseat. Whether you are kicking back to watch the game with some friends or sharing popcorn during a family movie night, this loveseat will be there with you through it all. With Best Home Furnishings' unique recline design, you can place this loveseat virtually right up against the wall. The loveseat reclines with the utmost ease in multiple configurations to provide you with the ultimate comfort. Optional sofa and recliner are available.

name: Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Loveseat
description: Catnapper Messina Chocolate Full Power Plus Lumbar Loveseat brings warmth and style into your living room. Beautifully designed and made using quality materials, it boasts a strong frame and soft yet resilient upholstery. Extra soft cushions ensure you experience a comfort level like no other. Finished in rich tones of chocolate leather with comfort-gel technology is also a refreshing relief as it gives you a better and cooler experience. The power headrest, recliner and lumber features in the loveseat will allow you to fully experience the lay flat positioning while giving flexibility to your head positioning and providing lower back support tailored to your needs. It has a center console for storage along with cup holders for convenience. Optional full power plus lumbar sofa and recliner are available.

name: Catnapper Milan Chocolate Loveseat
description: What the Catnapper Milan Chocolate Loveseat offers is hard to match by other loveseat. The designers really thought of the whole family when they created this living room set. It is the epitome of style, durability and luxury. Boasting Italian leather as their primary upholstery, the pieces of furniture in the Milan collection are sturdy not just in their inner frames but their covers as well. Italian leather is the zenith of leather excellence, and Catnapper furniture is beauty given form. Its strong and resilient frame is made using quality wood and lumber and provides superior support. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. Finished in rich tones of chocolate, it serves to brighten up any living room with its beauty and warmth. It has a center console for storage along with cup holders for convenience. Optional power sofa and manual recliner are available.

name: Catnapper Portman Saddle Loveseat
description: Catnapper Portman Saddle Loveseat is the perfect loveseat to have in your home. Finished in a two-tone saddle patchwork design color and texture complimented with luggage stitching, it brings back the comfort of traditional living while still offering functionality with next generation contemporary styling. Made with quality materials, it guarantees strength and durability. The cushions are made using quality foam and offer a wonderful lounging experience every time. The faux leather cover is soft and durable and the power recline in the loveseat will give you unparalleled comfort without punching a hole in your wallet. It has a center console for storage along with cup holders for convenience. Optional power sofa and power recliner are available.

name: Catnapper Voyager Brandy Loveseat
description: Catnapper Voyager Brandy Loveseat will embark you on a voyage to dreamland as the Catnapper Voyager gives you a ride to the sleeping paradise during your siesta. Once you are awake, the Voyager will accompany you to another adventure – the journey towards the charm you never knew you wanted! Only the finest materials and design, such as the Printed Polyester Faux Leather Fabric and sewn tufted back treatment with decorative stitching. This loveseat has the ultimate in function with the power recline seating, center storage console and cup holder in the middle. Optional power sofa and power recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Loveseats
name: Catnapper Westin Ash Loveseat
description: Catnapper Westin Ash Loveseat features a pub back design that is inviting and comfortable. Soft, padded polyester faux leather upholsters each piece, and recessed arm panels with ornate nail head trim add a bit of detail. Each seat cushion comes with a comfort coil system infused with Comfort-gel for added support and resiliency. Each reclining mechanism is attached to a metal seat box. The reclining mechanism is supported by the steel seat box and is not reliant on the wood frame for support where most manufactures screw the mechanism directly into the frame so that when the frame moves, the mechanism moves too which is not good. Catnapper is one of the few manufacturers to offer zipper access to key areas of the furniture. Soft and Durable are two words that often don’t go together in the furniture world. With Catnapper, Soft and Durable is possible. Often with high use, the soft areas of your loveseat will start showing signs of wear or sagging. This usually occurs in the backs and reclining chaise (footrest) areas. Catnapper has allowed easy access to these areas, via zippers, for re-stuffing. Optional sofa and recliner are available.
additional_attributes:
additional_sku=1052-2-LSC-1304-56,availability=In Stock,box_spring_required=No,brand=Catnapper,closeout=No,color_input=Ash,deal_of_the_day=No,dimensions=
  • Loveseat: 66" W x 42" D x 41" H
,features=
  • Comfort gel coil seating
  • 15 gauge heat tempered coils for support and durability
  • Foam and fiber encased for long lasting shape and comfort
  • Individually pocketed coils for a quiet seating experience
  • Exclusive reclining mechanism for smooth and quiet operation
  • Steel seat box for no warping or splitting like wood
  • Unitized steel base to resist bending
  • Direct drive cross bar for no side to side tilt
  • 8 gauge spring system for seat strength and comfort
  • Traditional design
  • Soft padded seat
  • Pub back
  • Upholstered in faux leather fabric
  • Recessed arm panel
  • Decorative nail head
  • Fabric Content: 100% Polyester
,material=Faux Leather,product_line_input=Westin,style=Contemporary,type_input=Loveseat

name: Delta 4160 Vivid Onyx Loveseat
description: Delta 4160 Vivid Onyx Loveseat gives your living room an upgrade when you choose the stylish Onyx Collection! This stylish collection features a modern shape with a contrasting welting trim that takes its classy style to another level. The linen-like onyx upholstery is paired with the Winchester Midnight and Sullivan Onyx accent pillows which add the perfect amount of rich color and paisley print to the loveseat. The slightly flared and very square arm rests and pillow-back design keeps the loveseat looking fresh and updated. Add this comfortable and fashionable loveseat to your home today for a classy update! Optional sofa is available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Loveseats
name: Franklin Hector Shadow Loveseat
description: Franklin Hector Shadow Loveseat gives you everything you need for a comfortable, cozy night in. This loveseat not only provides you with an ultra-comfortable place for two to sit, it offers you the convenience of a table right within the furnishing. The drop down table can be pulled down from the center of the loveseat where its padded support keeps it at a comfortable height between the seats on either side. The two seats are ultra spacious and wide to give you plenty of room to curl up in any position. On either side of the Loveseat are plush, supportive saddle arms that can support your no matter how far back you are reclined. Faux leather upholstery adds an elegant finishing touch. This collection features Franklin’s exclusive Wow Seating System, a unique combination of premium springs and gel injected seating foam that come together to deliver the best seat in the market place today. Optional sofa and recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Loveseats
name: Franklin Hobbs Sandstone Loveseat
description: Franklin Hobbs Sandstone Loveseat offers a sophisticated transitional style with subtle textural layering. A refined look, the Loveseat and sofa offers a linen undertone with T-cushions and track arms, along with tailored finishing accents in bold antique brass nail-head trim along the base of the front seat rail and lining the square-back pillow support. Completing the elegant arrangement, ornamental print throw pillows add a delightful element. Loose seat and back cushions are fully reversible for long wear and practicality. Franklin's WOW seating system delivers the best seating available with its unique combination of gel-injected seating foam and premium springs. Seat cushions are extra thick and designed to promote “sink into comfort”. Optional sofa, chair and ottoman are available.

Beautifully presented in faux leather, this striking loveseat is easier to maintain and more economical than its natural counterparts. Thick luggage stitching and brass nail-head trim around the arm fronts finish this exceptional loveseat in tailored detail. Plush seat backs and arms provide comfort you will look forward to again and again. With its gel-injected seating foam and premium springs, Franklin delivers the best seating available today in their remarkable WOW seating system. Optional sofa and rocker recliner are available.

categories: Landmark Categories/Living Room,Landmark Categories/Living Room/Loveseats
name: Jackson Drummond Dusk Loveseat
description: Jackson Drummond Dusk Loveseat is so buttery soft and sumptuous you'd swear it was made from your favorite leather coat, but in reality a meticulously crafted microfiber alternative that is a little warmer and a little easier to care for than its counterparts. With exposed channel stitching on its back, seat, and sides, this robust loveseat evokes a contemporary western vibe, but feels right at home in a variety of settings in its dusk color. Excellent loft within the channels gives this Loveseat just the right amount of support and body-surrounding comfort. The Jackson Furniture line's Comfort Coil Cushion system is unmatched in support and durability. Fifty individually pocketed foam-encased coils within the cushion allow independent movement resulting in a superior seating experience, while state-of-the-art gel-infused memory foam inserts cradle the user in cool, whisper-soft relaxation. Frames are constructed of hardwoods and plywoods with coil cushion core construction. Features include pillow top arms and deep seating to complement your cozy retreat or relaxed entertaining spot. Optional sofa, chair and a half and ottoman are available.
